Su.6.10.5 drākṣāṃ kṣaudraṃ candanaṃ yaṣṭikāhvaṃ yoṣitkṣīraṃ rātryanante ca piṣṭvā/
sarpiḥsiddhaṃ tarpaṇe sekanasye† śastaṃ kṣīraṃ siddhameteṣu cājam//
Su.6.10.6 yojyo vargo vyasta eṣo+anyathā vā samyaṅnasye+aṣṭārdhasaṃkhye+api nityam/
Su.6.10.7 pālāśaṃ syācchoṇitaṃ cāñjanārthe śallakyā vā śarkarākṣaudrayuktam/
rasakriyāṃ śarkarākṣaudrayuktāṃ pālindyāṃ vā madhuke vā+api kuryāt//
Su.6.10.8 mustā phenaḥ sāgarasyotpalaṃ ca kṛmighnailādhātribījādrasaśca/
Su.6.10.9 cūrṇaṃ kuryādañjanārthe raso vā stanyopeto dhātakīsyandanābhyām/
yoṣitstanyaṃ śātakumbhaṃ vighṛṣṭaṃ kṣaudropetaṃ kaiśukaṃ cāpi puṣpam//
Su.6.10.10 rodhraṃ drākṣāṃ śarkarāmutpalaṃ ca nāryāḥ kṣīre yaṣṭikāhvaṃ vacāṃ ca/
piṣṭvā kṣīre varṇakasya tvacaṃ ca toyonmiśre candanodumbare ca//
Su.6.10.11 kāryaḥ phenaḥ sāgarasyāñjanārthe nārīstanye mākṣike cāpi ghṛṣṭaḥ/
yoṣitstanye sthāpitaṃ yaṣṭikāhvaṃ rodhraṃ drākṣāṃ śarkarāmutpalaṃ ca//
Su.6.10.12 kṣaumābaddhaṃ pathyamāścyotane vā †sarpirghṛṣṭaṃ yaṣṭikāhvaṃ sarodhram/
Su.6.10.13 eṣo+amlākhye+anukramaścāpi śuktau kāryaḥ sarvaḥ syātsirāmokṣavarjyaḥ//
Su.6.10.14 sarpiḥ peyaṃ traiphalaṃ tailvakaṃ vā peyaṃ vā syāt kevalaṃ yat purāṇam/
Su.6.10.15 vaidūryaṃ yat sphāṭikaṃ vaidrumaṃ ca mauktaṃ śāṅkhaṃ rājataṃ śātakumbham/
cūrṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ śarkarākṣaudrayuktaṃ śuktiṃ hanyādañjanaṃ caitadāśu//
Su.6.10.16 yuñjyāt sarpirdhūmadarśī narastu śeṣaṃ kuryādraktapitte vidhānam/
yaccaivānyat pittahṛccāpi sarvaṃ yadvīsarpe paittike vai vidhānam//

div.trailer: iti śrīsuśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre pittābhiṣyandapratiṣedho nāma daśamo+adhyāyaḥ //10//

div.head: ekādaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.11.1 athātaḥ śleṣmābhiṣyandapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.11.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.11.3 syandādhimanthau kaphajau pravṛddhau jayet sirāṇāmatha mokṣaṇena/
Su.6.11.5 tadannapānaṃ ca samācareddhi yacchleṣmaṇo naiva karoti vṛddhim/
trīṇyūṣaṇāni triphalā haridrā viḍaṅgasāraśca samāni ca syuḥ//
Su.6.11.9 phalaṃ prakīryādathavā+api śigroḥ puṣpaṃ ca †tulyaṃ bṛhatīdvayasya/
rasāñjanaṃ saindhavacandanaṃ ca manaḥśilāle laśunaṃ ca tulyam//
Su.6.11.11 nīlān yavān gavyapayo+anupītān śalākinaḥ śuṣkatanūn vidahya/
Su.6.11.13 mahauṣadhaṃ māgadhikāṃ ca mustāṃ† sasaindhavaṃ yanmaricaṃ ca śuklam/
Su.6.11.14 †phale bṛhatyā magadhodbhavānā nidhāya kalkaṃ phalapākakāle/
†srotojayuktaṃ ca taduddhṛtaṃ syāttadvattu piṣṭe vidhireṣa cāpi//
nādeyamagryaṃ maricaṃ ca śuklaṃ nepālajātā ca samapramāṇā//
Su.6.11.17 samātuluṅgadrava eṣa yogaḥ kaṇḍūṃ nihanyāt sakṛdañjanena/
saśṛṅgaveraṃ suradāru mustaṃ sindhuprabhūtaṃ(prasūtaṃ) mukulāni jātyāḥ//
Su.6.11.18 surāprapiṣṭaṃ tvidamañjanaṃ hi kaṇḍvāṃ ca śophe ca hitaṃ vadanti/
syandādhimanthakramamācarecca sarveṣu caiteṣu sadā+apramattaḥ// (viśeṣato nāvanameva kāryaṃ saṃsarjanaṃ cāpi yathopadiṣṭam†)

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre kaphābhiṣyandapratiṣedho nāmaikādaśo+adhyāyaḥ //11//

div.head: dvādaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.12.1 athāto raktābhiṣyandapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.12.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.12.3 manthaṃ syandaṃ sirotpātaṃ sirāharṣaṃ ca raktajam/
Su.6.12.5 viriktānāṃ prakāmaṃ ca śirāṃsyeṣāṃ viśodhayet/
vairecanikasiddhena sitāyuktena sarpiṣā// (majjñā vā tadvimiśreṇa medasā tacchṛtena vā/
Su.6.12.6 tataḥ pradehāḥ pariṣecanāni nasyāni dhūmāśca yathāsvameva/
Su.6.12.8 rujāyāṃ cāpyatibhṛśaṃ svedāśca mṛdavo hitāḥ/
akṣṇoḥ samantataḥ kāryaṃ pātanaṃ ca jalaukasām//
Su.6.12.9 ghṛtasya mahatī mātrā pītā cārtiṃ niyacchati/
Su.6.12.13 candanaṃ kumudaṃ patraṃ śilājatu sakuṅkumam/
Su.6.12.14 trapu kāṃsyamalaṃ cāpi piṣṭvā puṣparasena tu/
vipulā yāḥ kṛtā vartyaḥ pūjitāścāñjane sadā//
Su.6.12.15 syādañjanaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṣaudraṃ sirotpātasya bheṣajam/
Su.6.12.17 yuktaṃ tu madhunā vā+api gairikaṃ hitamañjane/
Su.6.12.18 madhunā tārkṣyajaṃ vā+api kāsīaṃ vā sasaidhavam/
ekaśo vā dviśo vā+api yojitaṃ vā tribhistribhiḥ//
Su.6.12.22 sphaṭikaṃ vidrumaṃ śaṅkho madhukaṃ kadhu caiva hi/
Su.6.12.24 kāsīsaṃ madhunā vā+api yojyamatrāñjane sadā/
Su.6.12.28 uttānamavagāḍhaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vā+api savraṇam/
Su.6.12.29 śukrasya gharṣaṇaṃ kāryamathavā saindhavena tu/
dvitvaggate saśūle vā vātaghnaṃ tarpaṇaṃ hitam//
Su.6.12.35 vaṃśajāruṣkarau tālaṃ nārikelaṃ ca dāhayet/
ajakāṃ pārśvato viddhvā sūcyā visrāvya codakam//
Su.6.12.37 vraṇaṃ gomāṃsacūrṇena pūrayet sarpiṣā saha/
Su.6.12.38 saśophaścāpyaśophaśca dvau pākau yau prakīrtitau/
Su.6.12.41 ghṛtaṃ kāṃsyamalopetaṃ stanyaṃ vā+api sasaindhavam/
Su.6.12.44 jātyāḥ puṣpaṃ saindhavaṃ śṛṅgaveraṃ kṛṣṇābījaṃ kīṭaśatrośca sāram/
etat piṣṭaṃ netrapāke+añjanārthaṃ kṣaudropetaṃ nirviśaṅkaṃ† prayojyam//
Su.6.12.45 pūyālase śoṇitamokṣaṇaṃ ca hitaṃ tathaivāpyupanāhanaṃ ca/
Su.6.12.47 snehādibhiḥ samyagapāsya doṣāṃstṛptiṃ vidhāyātha yathāsvameva/
Su.6.12.49 patraṃ phalaṃ cāmalakasya paktvā kriyāṃ vidadhyādathavā+añjanārthe/
vaṃśasya bhūlena rasakriyāṃ vā vartīkṛtāṃ tāmrakapālapakvām//
Su.6.12.50 rasakriyāṃ vā triphalāvipakvāṃ palāśapuṣpaiḥ svaramañjarervā/
piṣṭvā chagalyāḥ payasā malaṃ vā kāṃsasya dagdhvā saha tāntavena//
Su.6.12.51 pratyañjanaṃ tanmaricairupetaṃ cūrṇena tāmrasya sahopayojyam/
samudraphenaṃ lavaṇottamaṃ ca śaṅkho+atha mudgo maricaṃ ca śuklam//
praklinnavartmanyapi caita eva yogāḥ prayojyāśca samīkṣya doṣam//
Su.6.12.53 sakajjalaṃ tāmraghaṭe ca ghṛṣṭaṃ sarpiryutaṃ tulthakamañjanaṃ ca//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre raktābhiṣyandapratiṣedho nāma dvādaśo+adhyāyaḥ //12//

div.head: trayodaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.13.1 athāto lekhyarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.13.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.13.3 nava ye+abhihitā lekhyāḥ sāmānyasteṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ/
Su.6.13.5 aṅgulyaṅguṣṭhakābhyāṃ tu nirbhugnaṃ vartma yatnataḥ/
Su.6.13.6 tataḥ pramṛjya plotena vartma śastrapadāṅkitam/
likhecchastreṇa patrairvā tato rakte sthite punaḥ//
Su.6.13.8 prakṣālya haviṣā siktaṃ vraṇavat samupācaret/
Su.6.13.10 samaṃ nakhanibhaṃ vartma likhitaṃ samyagiṣyate/
Su.6.13.13 vyāvartate yadā vartma pakṣma cāpi †vimuhyati/
vartmāvabandhaṃ kliṣṭaṃ ca bahalaṃ yacca kīrtitam//
Su.6.13.17 bhaveyurvartmasu ca yāḥ piḍakāḥ kaṭhinā bhṛśam/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre lekhyarogapratiṣedho nāma trayodaśo+adhyāyaḥ //13//

div.head: caturdaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.14.1 athāto bhedyarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.14.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.14.6 mahatyapi ca yuñjīta kṣārāgnī vidhikovidaḥ/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre bhedyarogapratiṣedho nāma caturdaśo+adhyāyaḥ //14//

div.head: pañcadaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.15.1 athātaśchedyarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.15.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.15.4 tataḥ saṃroṣitaṃ tūrṇaṃ susvinnaṃ paridhaṭṭitam/
Su.6.15.6 na cotthāpayatā kṣipraṃ kāryamabhyunnataṃ† tu tat/
vraṇavat saṃvidhānaṃ tu tasya kuryādataḥ param//
Su.6.15.16 pralepaḥ saghṛtaḥ śītaḥ kṣīrapiṣṭaḥ praśasyate/
Su.6.15.17 arma cālpaṃ dadhinibhaṃ nīlaṃ raktamathāpi vā/
chedyameva tadarma syāt kṛṣṇamaṇḍalagaṃ ca yat//
Su.6.15.20 sirājāle sirā yāstu kaṭhināstāśca buddhimān/
Su.6.15.21 sirāsu piḍakā jātā yā na sidhyanti bheṣajaiḥ/
Su.6.15.23 sandhau saṃsvedya śastreṇa varṇīkāṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ/
śaṅkhaṃ samudraphenaṃ ca maṇḍūkīṃ ca samudrajām//
Su.6.15.26 sphaṭikaṃ kuruvindaṃ ca pravālāśmantakaṃ tathā/
Su.6.15.27 samabhāgāni saṃpiṣya sārdhaṃ srotoñjanena tu/
armāṇi piḍakāṃ hanyāt sirājālāni tena vai//
Su.6.15.29 arśastathā yacca nāmnā śuṣkārśo+arbudameva ca/
sthite ca rudhire vartma dahet samyak śalākayā//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre chedyarogapratiṣedho nāma pñcadaśo+adhyāyaḥ //15//

div.head: ṣoḍaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.16.1 athātaḥ †pakṣmakopapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.16.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.16.3 yāpyastu yo vartmabhavo vikāraḥ pakṣmaprakopo+abhihitaḥ purastāt/
Su.6.16.4 bhruvoradhastāt parimucya bhāgau pakṣmāśritaṃ caikamato+avakṛntet/
Su.6.16.5 utkṛtya śastreṇa yavapramāṇaṃ bālena sīvyodbhiṣagapramattaḥ/
dattvā ca sarpirmadhunā+avaśeṣaṃ kuryādvidhānaṃ† vihitaṃ vraṇe yat//
Su.6.16.6 lalāṭadeśe ca nibaddhapaṭṭaṃ† prāksyūtamatrāpyaparaṃ ca baddhvā/
sthairyaṃ gate cāpyatha śastramārge bālān vimuñcet kuśalo+abhivīkṣya//
Su.6.16.7 evaṃ na cecchāmyati tasya vartma nirbhujya doṣopahatāṃ valiṃ ca/
tato+agninā vā pratisārayettāṃ kṣāreṇa vā samyagavekṣya dhīraḥ//
Su.6.16.8 chittvā samaṃ vā+apyupapakṣmamālāṃ samyaggṛhītvā baḍiśaistribhistu/
pathyāphalena pratisārayettu ghṛṣṭena vā tauvarakeṇa samyak//
Su.6.16.9 catvāra ete vidhayo vihantuṃ pakṣmoparodhaṃ pṛthageva śastāḥ/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre pakṣmagatarogapratiṣedho nāma ṣoḍaśo+adhyāyaḥ //16//

div.head: saptadaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.17.1 athāto dṛṣṭigatarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.17.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.17.3 trayaḥ sādhyāstrayo+asādhyā yāpyāḥ ṣaṭ ca bhavanti hi/
Su.6.17.4 dṛṣṭau pittavidagdhāyāṃ vidagdhāyāṃ kaphena ca/
Su.6.17.6 tailvakaṃ cobhayoḥ pathyaṃ kevalaṃ jīrṇameva vā/
gairikaṃ saindhavaṃ kṛṣṇā godantasya maṣī tathā//
Su.6.17.7 gomāṃsaṃ maricaṃ bījaṃ śirīṣasya manaḥśilā/
Su.6.17.8 catvāra ete yogāḥ syurubhayorañjane hitāḥ/
Su.6.17.16 srotojaṃ saindhavaṃ reṇukāṃ cāpi peṣayet/
Su.6.17.17 kālānusārivāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ nāgaraṃ madhukaṃ tathā/
medo yakṛdghṛtaṃ cājaṃ pippalyaḥ saidhavaṃ madhu//
Su.6.17.25 tathā yakṛcchāgabhavaṃ hutāśane vipācya samyaṅmagadhāsamanvitam/
Su.6.17.26 plīhā yakṛccāpyupabhākṣite† ubhe prakalpya śūlye ghṛtatailasaṃyute/
Su.6.17.27 nadījaśimbītrikaṭūnyathāñjanaṃ manaḥśilā dve ca niśe yakṛd(śakṛd)gavām/
Su.6.17.28 bhavanti yāpyāḥ khalu ye ṣaḍāmayā haredasṛkteṣu sirāvimokṣaṇaiḥ/
Su.6.17.29 payovimiśraṃ pavanodbhave hitaṃ vadanti pañcāṅgulatailameva tu/
Su.6.17.30 trivṛdvirekaḥ kaphaje praśasyate tridoṣaje tailamuśanti tatkṛtam/
Su.6.17.31 hitaṃ ca vidyāttriphalāghṛtaṃ sadā kṛtaṃ ca yanmeṣaviṣāṇanāmabhiḥ/
Su.6.17.32 samīraje tailayutāṃ kaphātmake madhupragāḍhāṃ vidadhīta yuktitaḥ/
gavāṃ śakṛtkvāthavipakvamuttamaṃ hitaṃ tu tailaṃ timireṣu nāvanam//
Su.6.17.33 hitaṃ ghṛtaṃ kevala eva paittike hyajāvikaṃ yanmadhurairvipācitam/
tailaṃ sthirādau madhure ca yadgaṇe tathā+aṇutailaṃ pavanāsṛgutthayoḥ//
Su.6.17.34 sahāśvagandhātibalāvarīśṛtaṃ hitaṃ ca nasye trivṛtaṃ yadīritam/
Su.6.17.35 sasaindhavaḥ kravyabhugeṇamāṃsayorhitaḥ sasarpiḥ samadhuḥ puṭāhvayaḥ/
Su.6.17.36 pratyañjanaṃ srotasi yatsamutthitaṃ kramādrasakṣīraghṛteṣu bhāvitam/
subhāvitaṃ vā payasā dinatrayaṃ kācāpahaṃ śāstravidaḥ pracakṣate//
Su.6.17.38 havirhitaṃ kṣīrabhavaṃ tu paittike vadanti nasye madhurauṣadhaiḥ kṛtam/
tattarpaṇe caiva hitaṃ prayojitaṃ sajāṅgalasteṣu ca yaḥ puṭāhvayaḥ//
samāñjanaṃ vā kanakākarodbhavaṃ sucūrṇitaṃ śreṣṭhamuśanti tadvidaḥ//
Su.6.17.40 bhilloṭagandhodakasekasecitaṃ pratyañjane cātra hitaṃ tu tutthakam/
Su.6.17.41 palāśarohītamadhūkajā rasāḥ kṣaudreṇa yuktā madirāgramiśritāḥ†/
vanaspatikvāthavipācitaṃ ghṛtaṃ hitaṃ haridrānalade ca tarpaṇam//
Su.6.17.43 samāgadho mākṣikasaindhavāḍhyaḥ sajāṅgalaḥ syāt puṭapāka eva ca/
Su.6.17.44 hite ca kāsīsarasāñjane tathā vadanti pathye guḍanāgarairyute/
yadañjanaṃ vā bahuśo niṣecitaṃ samūtravarge triphalodake śṛte//
Su.6.17.45 niśācarāsthisthitametadañjanaṃ kṣipecca māsaṃ salile+asthire punaḥ/
meṣasya puṣpairmadhukena saṃyutaṃ tadañjanaṃ sarvakṛte prayojayet//
Su.6.17.46 kriyāśca sarvāḥ kṣatajodbhave hitaḥ kramaḥ parimlāyini cāpi pittahṛt/
kramo hitaḥ syandaharaḥ prayojitaḥ samīkṣya doṣeṣu† yathāsvameva ca//
Su.6.17.47 doṣodaye naiva ca viplutiṃgate dravyāṇi nasyādiṣu yojayedbudhaḥ/
Su.6.17.48 ghṛtaṃ purāṇaṃ triphalāṃ śatāvarīṃ paṭolamudgāmalakaṃ yavānapi/
niṣevamāṇasya narasya yatnato bhayaṃ sughorarāttimirānna vidyate//
Su.6.17.49 śatāvarīpāyasa eva kevalastathā kṛto vā++āmalakeṣu pāyasaḥ/
Su.6.17.50 jīvantiśākaṃ suniṣaṇṇakaṃ ca sataṇḍulīyaṃ varavāstukaṃ ca/
cillī tathā mūlakapotikā ca dṛṣṭerhitaṃ śākunajāṅgalaṃ ca//
Su.6.17.55 ślaiṣmike liṅganāśe tu karma vakṣyāmi siddhaye/
Su.6.17.56 viṣamo vā tanurmadhye rājimān vā bahuprabhaḥ/
dṛṣṭistho lakṣyate doṣaḥ sarujo vā salohitaḥ//
Su.6.17.58 matimān śuklabhāgau dvau kṛṣṇānmuktvā hyapāṅgataḥ/
Su.6.17.59 nādho nordhvaṃ na pārśvābhyāṃ chidre daivakṛte tataḥ/
dakṣiṇena bhiṣak savyaṃ vidhyet savyena cetarat//
Su.6.17.62 sthire doṣe cale vā+api svedayedakṣi bāhyataḥ/
Su.6.17.65 tadā+asau likhitā samyag jñeyā yā cāpi nirvyathā/
tato gṛhe nirābādhe śayītottāna eva ca//
paścātkarma ca seveta laghvannaṃ cāpi mātrayā//
Su.6.17.71 sirāvyadhavidhau pūrvaṃ narā ye ṛca vivarjitāḥ/
Su.6.17.74 vyadhenāsannakṛṣṇena rāgaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ ca pīḍyate/
Su.6.17.75 athāpyupari viddhe tu kaṣṭā ruk saṃpravartate/
Su.6.17.82 śalākā karkaśā śūlaṃ kharā doṣapariplutim/
Su.6.17.87 rujāyāmakṣirāge vā yogān bhūyo nibodha me/
gairikaṃ sārivā dūrvā yavapiṣṭaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ//
Su.6.17.95 śāmyatyevaṃ na cecchūlaṃ snigdhasvinnasya mokṣayet/
tataḥ sirāṃ dahedvā+api matimān kīrtitaṃ yathā//
Su.6.17.96 dṛṣṭerataḥ prasādārthamañjane śṛṇu me śubhe/
Su.6.17.99 maricāni ca tadvartīḥ kārayeccāpi pūrvavat/
Su.6.17.100 bhūyo vakṣyāmi mukhyāni vistareṇāñjanāni ca/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre dṛṣṭigatarogavijñānīyo nāma saptadaśo+adhyāyaḥ //17//

div.head: aṣṭādaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.18.1 athātaḥ kriyākalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.18.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: tatra tatropadiṣṭāni teṣāṃ vyāsaṃ nibodha me//
Su.6.18.8 āpakṣmāgrāttataḥ sthāpyaṃ pañca tadvākśatāni tu/
svasthe kaphe ṣaṭ pitte+aṣṭau daśa vāte taduttamam//
Su.6.18.10 daśa dṛṣṭyāmathāṣṭau ca vākśatāni vibhāvayet/
Su.6.18.12 ekāhaṃ vā tryahaṃ vā+api pañcāhaṃ ceṣyate param/
Su.6.18.19 aśāntopadrave cākṣiṇa tarpaṇaṃ na praśasyate/
Su.6.18.20 tarpaṇārhā na ye proktāḥ snehapānākṣamāśca ye/
Su.6.18.21 puṭapākaḥ prayoktavyo netreṣu bhiṣajā bhavet/
Su.6.18.22 hitaḥ snigdho+atirūkṣasya snigdhasyāpi ca lekhanaḥ/
snehataḥ puṭapākastu dhāryo dve vākśate tu saḥ//
Su.6.18.27 vitarettarpaṇoktaṃ tu dhūmaṃ hitvā tu ropaṇam/
snehasvedau dvayoḥ kāryau kāryo naiva ca ropaṇe//
Su.6.18.28 ekāhaṃ vā dvyahaṃ vā+api tryahaṃ vā+apyavacāraṇam/
dvau bilvamātrau ślakṣṇasya piṇḍau māṃsasya peṣitau//
Su.6.18.34 dravyāṇāṃ bilvamātraṃ tu dravāṇāṃ kuḍavo mataḥ/
Su.6.18.37 svinnamuddhṛtya niṣpīḍya rasamādāya taṃ nṛṇām/
rakte pitte ca tau śītau koṣṇau vātakaphāpahau//
Su.6.18.42 tasmāt pariharan doṣān vidadhyāttau sukhāvahau/
lekhane sapta cāṣṭau vā bindavaḥ snaihike daśa//
Su.6.18.46 āścyotane prayoktavyā dvādaśaiva tu ropaṇe/
sekasya dviguṇaḥ kālaḥ puṭapākāt paro mataḥ//
Su.6.18.49 karoti śiraso bastiruktā ye mūrdhatailikāḥ/
Su.6.18.51 tarpaṇoktaṃ daśaguṇaṃ yathādoṣaṃ vidhānavit// vyaktarūpeṣu doṣeṣu śuddhakāyasya kevale//
Su.6.18.52 netra eva sthite doṣe prāptamañjanamācaret/
Su.6.18.55 kaṣāyaṃ tiktakaṃ vā+api sasnehaṃ ropaṇaṃ matam/
Su.6.18.62 āyasāni ca yojyāni śalākāśca yathākramam/
audumbaryaśmajā vā+api śārīrī vā hitā bhavet//
Su.6.18.65 āpāṅgyaṃ vā yathāyogaṃ kuryāccāpi gatāgatam/
Su.6.18.67 doṣaḥ pratinivṛttaḥ san hanyād dṛṣṭerbalaṃ tathā/
Su.6.18.68 prakṣālyākṣi yathādoṣaṃ kāryaṃ pratyañjanaṃ tataḥ/
Su.6.18.74 lekhanasya viśeṣeṇa kāla eṣa prakīrtitaḥ/
tatra doṣaharaṃ rūkṣaṃ bheṣajaṃ śasyate mṛdu//
Su.6.18.86 ekādaśaitān bhāgāṃstu yojayet kuśalo bhiṣak/
gavāṃ śakṛdrase mūtre dadhni sarpiṣi mākṣike//
niṣecayet pṛthak cainaṃ dhmātaṃ dhmātaṃ punaḥ punaḥ//
Su.6.18.90 tato+antarīkṣe saptāhaṃ plotabaddhaṃ sthitaṃ jale/
śātakumbhe+atha śārṅge vā rājate vā susaṃskṛte/
meṣaśṛṅgasya puṣpāṇi vakraṃ ratnāpi sapta ca//
Su.6.18.95 utpalasya bṛhatyośca padmasyāpi ca keśaram/
Su.6.18.97 kṛtvā sūkṣmaṃ tataścūrṇaṃ nyasedabhyarcya pūrvavat/
Su.6.18.98 vakraṃ samaricaṃ caiva māṃsīṃ śaileyameva ca/
Su.6.18.101 rodhraṃ sāvarakaṃ cūrṇamāyasaṃ tāmrameva ca/
Su.6.18.102 tulyāni payasā piṣṭvā guṭikāṃ kārayedbudhaḥ/
Su.6.18.104 ājena payasā piṣṭvā tāmrapātraṃ pralepayet/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre kriyākalpo nāmāṣṭadaśo+adhyāyaḥ //18//

div.head: ekonaviṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.19.1 athāto nayanābhighātapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.19.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.19.3 abhyāhate tu nayane bahudhā narāṇāṃ saṃrambharāgatumulāsu rujāsu dhīmān/
Su.6.19.4 dṛṣṭiprasādajananaṃ vidhimāśu kuryāt snigdhairhimaiśca madhuraiśca tathā prayogai/
Su.6.19.5 sadyohate nayana eṣa vidhistadūrdhvaṃ syanderito bhavati doṣamavekṣya kāryaḥ/
Su.6.19.6 sādhyaṃ kṣataṃ paṭalamekamubhe tu kṛcchre trīṇi kṣatāni paṭalāni vivarjayattu/
syāt piccitaṃ ca nayanaṃ hyati cāvasannaṃ srastaṃ cyutaṃ ca hatadṛk ca bhavettu yāpyam//
Su.6.19.8 netre vilambini vidhirvihitaḥ purastāducchiṅghanaṃ śirasi vāryavasecanaṃ ca/
ṣaṭsaptatirnayanajā ya ime pradiṣṭā rogā bhavantyamahatāṃ mahatāṃ ca tebhyaḥ//
mṛdnāti netramatikaṇḍumathākṣikūṭaṃ nāsālalāṭamapi tena śiśuḥ sa nityam//
Su.6.19.10 sūryaprabhāṃ na sahate sravati prabaddhaṃ tasyāharedrudhiramāśu vinirlikhecca/
kṣaudrāyutaiśca kaṭubhiḥ pratisārayettu mātuḥ śiśorabhihitaṃ ca vidhiṃ vidadhyāt//
Su.6.19.11 taṃ vāmayettu madhusaindhavasaṃprayuktaiḥ pītaṃ payaḥ khalu phalaiḥ kharamañjarīṇām//
Su.6.19.12 syātpippalīlavaṇamākṣikasaṃyutairvā nainaṃ vamantamapi vāmayituṃ yateta/
dattvā vacāmaśanadugdhabhuje prayojyamūrdhvaṃ tataḥ phalayutaṃ vamanaṃ vidhijñaiḥ//
Su.6.19.13 jambvāmradhātryaṇudalaiḥ paridhāvanārthaṃ kāryaṃ kaṣāyamavasecanameva cāpi/
āścyotane ca hitamatra ghṛtaṃ guḍūcīsiddhaṃ tathā++āhurapi ca triphalāvipakvam//
syādañjanaṃ madhurasāmadhukāmrakairvā kṛṣṇāyasaṃ ghṛtapayo madhu vā+api dagdham//
Su.6.19.15 vyoṣaṃ palāṇḍu madhukaṃ lavaṇottamaṃ ca lākṣāṃ ca gairikayutāṃ guṭikāñjanaṃ vā/
syande kaphādabhihitaṃ kramamācarecca bālasya rogakuśalo+akṣigadaṃ jighāṃsuḥ//
Su.6.19.17 samudra iva gambhīraṃ naiva śakyaṃ cikitsitam/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre nayanābhighātacikitsitaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //19//

div.head: viṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.20.1 athātaḥ karṇagatarogavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.20.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.20.3 karṇaśūlaṃ praṇādaśca bādhiryaṃ kṣveḍa eva ca/
Su.6.20.6 samīraṇaḥ śrotragato+anyathācaraḥ samantataḥ śūlamatīva karṇayoḥ/
karoti doṣaiśca yathāsvamāvṛtaḥ sa karṇaśūlaḥ kathito durācaraḥ//
Su.6.20.7 yadā tu nāḍīṣu vimārgamāgataḥ sa eva śabdābhivahāsu tiṣṭhati/
śrṇoti śabdān vividhāṃstadā naraḥ praṇādamenaṃ kathayanti cāmayam//
Su.6.20.8 sa eva śabdānuvahā yadā sirāḥ kaphānuyāto vyanusṛtya tiṣṭhati/
Su.6.20.9 śramāt kṣayādrūkṣakaṣāyabhojanāt samīraṇaḥ śabdapathe pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
viriktaśīrṣasya ca śītasevinaḥ karoti hi kṣveḍamatīva karṇayoḥ//
Su.6.20.10 śirobhighātādathavā nimajjato jale prapākādayavā+api vidradheḥ/
sravettu pūyaṃ śravaṇo+anilāvṛtaḥ sa karṇasaṃsrāva iti prakīrtitaḥ//
Su.6.20.11 kaphena kaṇḍūḥ pracitena karṇayorbhṛśaṃ bhavet srotasi karṇasaṃjñite/
viśoṣite śleṣmaṇi pittatejasā nṛṇāṃ bhavet srotasi karṇagūthakaḥ//
Su.6.20.12 sa karṇaviṭko dravatāṃ yadā gato vilāyito ghrāṇamukhaṃ prapadyate/
Su.6.20.13 yadā tu mūrcchantyathavā+api jantavaḥ sṛjantyapatyānyathavā+api makṣikāḥ/
Su.6.20.15 bhavet prapākaḥ khalu pittakopato vikothavikledakaraśca karṇayoḥ/
sthite kaphe srotasi pittatejasaḥ vilāyyamāne bhṛśasaṃpratāpavān//
Su.6.20.16 avedano vā+apyathavā savedano ghanaṃ sravet pūti ca pūtikarṇakaḥ/
mayā purastāt prasamīkṣya yojayedihaiva tāvat prayato bhiṣagvaraḥ//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre karṇagatarogavijñānīyo nāma viṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ //20//

div.head: ekoviṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.21.1 athātaḥ karṇagatarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.21.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: tat prāptaṃ śravaṇasrotaḥ sadyo gṛhṇāti vedanām//
Su.6.21.12 niranno niśi tatsarpiḥ pītvopari pibet payaḥ/
Su.6.21.13 śatapākaṃ balātailaṃ praśastaṃ cāpi bhojane/
Su.6.21.16 kalkaireṣāṃ tathā+amlaiśca pacet snehaṃ caturvidham/
Su.6.21.18 śṛṅgaverarasaḥ kṣaudraṃ saindhavaṃ tailameva ca/
Su.6.21.21 yattailaṃ cyavate tebhyo dhṛtebhyo bhājanopari/
Su.6.21.22 kuryādevaṃ bhadrakāṣṭhe kuṣṭhe kāṣṭhe ca sārale/
Su.6.21.26 karṇaṃ koṣṇena cukreṇa pūrayet karṇaśūlinaḥ/
Su.6.21.28 mūtreṣvamleṣu vātaghne gaṇe ca kvathite bhiṣak/
Su.6.21.29 etā eva kriyāḥ kuryāt pittaghnaiḥ pittasaṃyute/
kākolyādau daśakṣīraṃ tiktaṃ cātra hitaṃ haviḥ//
Su.6.21.32 surasādau kṛtaṃ tailaṃ pañcamūle mahatyapi/
Su.6.21.33 ekaikaḥ pūraṇe pathyastailaṃ teṣvapi vā kṛtam/
Su.6.21.35 sāmānyato viśeṣeṇa† bādhirye pūraṇaṃ śṛṇu/
gavāṃ mūtreṇa bilvāni piṣṭvā tailaṃ vipācayet//
Su.6.21.36 sajalaṃ ca sadugdhaṃ ca bādhirye karṇapūraṇam/
vakṣyate yaḥ pratiśyāye vidhiḥ so+apyatra pūjitaḥ//
Su.6.21.39 vātavyādhiṣu yaścokto vidhiḥ sa ca hito bhavet/
Su.6.21.40 samānaṃ karma kurvīta yogān vaiśeṣikānapi/
Su.6.21.41 pramārjanaṃ dhāvanaṃ ca vīkṣya vīkṣyāvcārayet/
Su.6.21.42 karṇaprakṣālanaṃ kāryaṃ cūrṇaireṣāṃ ca pūraṇam/
Su.6.21.43 karṇasrāve praśaṃsanti pūraṇaṃ madhunā saha/
Su.6.21.44 yojito madhunā vā+api karṇasrāve praśasyate/
Su.6.21.52 vārtākudhūmaśca hitaḥ sārṣapasneha eva ca/
chardanaṃ dhūmapānaṃ ca kavalasya ca dhāraṇam//
Su.6.21.54 karṇakṣveḍe hitaṃ tailaṃ sārṣapaṃ caiva pūraṇam/
Su.6.21.55 prakledya dhīmāṃstailena svedena pravilāyya ca/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre karṇagatarogapratiṣedho nāmaikaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //21//

div.head: dvāviṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ//
div.ab: Su.6.22.1 athāto nāsāgatarogavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.22.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.22.5 catvāryarśāṃsi catvāraḥ śophāḥ saptārbudāni ca/
Su.6.22.6 ānahyate yasya vidhūpyate ca praklidyate śuṣyati† cāpi nāsā/
na vetti yo gandharasāṃśca janturjuṣṭaṃ vyavasyettamapīnasena//
Su.6.22.7 taṃ cānilaśleṣmabhavaṃ vikāraṃ brūyāt pratiśyāyasamānaliṅgam/
Su.6.22.8 nireti pūtirmukhanāsikābhyāṃ taṃ pūtināsaṃ pravadanti rogam/
vrāṇāśritaṃ pittamarūṃṣi kuryādyasmin vikāre balavāṃśca pākaḥ//
Su.6.22.9 taṃ nāsikāpākamiti vyavasyedvikledakothāvapi yatra dṛṣṭau/
caturvidhaṃ dviprabhavaṃ vakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ khalu raktapittam//
nāsā sravet pūyamasṛgvimiśraṃ taṃ pūyaraktaṃ pravadanti rogam//
Su.6.22.11 ghrāṇāśrite marmaṇi saṃpraduṣṭe† yasyānilo nāsikayā nireti//
Su.6.22.12 kaphānuyāto bahuśaḥ saśabdastaṃ rogamāhuḥ kṣavathuṃ vidhijñāḥ/
prabhraśyate nāsikayaiva yaśca† sāndro vidagdho lavaṇaḥ kaphastu//
Su.6.22.14 prāk saṃcito mūrdhani pittataptastaṃ bhraṃśathuṃ vyādhimudāharanti/
ghrāṇe bhṛśaṃ dāhasamanvite tu viniḥsareddhūma iveha vāyuḥ//
Su.6.22.15 nāsā pradīpteva ca yasya jantorvyādhiṃ tu taṃ dīptamudāharanti/
kaphāvṛto vāyurudānasaṃjño yadā svamārge viguṇaḥ sthitaḥ syāt//
Su.6.22.16 ghrāṇaṃ vṛṇotīva tadā sa rogo nāsāpratīnāha iti pradiṣṭaḥ/
Su.6.22.17 rātrau viśeṣeṇa hi taṃ vikāraṃ nāsāparisrāvamiti vyavasyet/
ghrāṇāśrite śleṣmaṇi mārutena pittena gāḍhaṃ pariśoṣite ca//
Su.6.22.19 śālākyasiddhāntamavekṣya cāpi sarvātmakaṃ saptamamarbudaṃ tu/
rogaḥ pratiśyāya ihopadiṣṭaḥ sa vakṣyate pañcavidhaḥ purastāt//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre nāsāgatarogavijñānīyo nāma dvāviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //22//

div.head: trayoviṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.23.1 athāto nāsāgatarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.23.2 athovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.23.3 pūrvoddiṣṭe pūtinasye ca jantoḥ snehasvedau chardanaṃ sraṃsanaṃ ca/
yuktaṃ bhaktaṃ tīkṣṇamalpaṃ laghu syāduṣṇaṃ toyaṃ dhūmapānaṃ ca kāle//
Su.6.23.4 hiṅgu vyoṣaṃ vatsakākhyaṃ śivāṭī lākṣā bījaṃ saurabhaṃ kaṭphalaṃ ca/
ugrā kuṣṭhaṃ tīkṣṇagandhā viḍaṅgaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nityaṃ cāvapīḍe karañjam//
Su.6.23.5 etairdravyaiḥ sārṣapaṃ mūtrayuktaṃ tailaṃ dhīmānnasyahetoḥ paceta/
nāsāpāke pittahṛtsaṃvidhānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ ca//
Su.6.23.6 hṛtvā raktaṃ kṣīravṛkṣatvacaśca sājyāḥ sekā yojanīyāśca lepāḥ/
Su.6.23.7 vānte samyak cāvapīḍaṃ vadanti tīkṣṇaṃ dhūmaṃ śodhanaṃ cātra nasyam/
kṣepyaṃ nasyaṃ mūrdhavairecanīyairnāḍyā cūrṇaṃ kṣavathau bhraṃśathau ca//
Su.6.23.8 kuryāt svedān mūrdhni vātāmayaghnān snigdhān dhūmān yadyanyaddhitaṃ ca/
dīpte roge paittikaṃ saṃvidhānaṃ kuryāt sarvaṃ svādu yacchītalaṃ ca//
Su.6.23.9 nāsānāhe snehapānaṃ pradhānaṃ snigdhā dhūmā mūrdhabastiśca nityam/
Su.6.23.10 nāsāsrāve ghrāṇataścūrṇamuktaṃ nāḍyā deyaṃ yo+avapīḍaśca tīkṣṇaḥ/
tīkṣṇaṃ dhūmaṃ devadārvagnikābhyāṃ māṃsaṃ vā++ājaṃ yuktamatrādiśanti//
Su.6.23.11 nāsāśoṣe kṣīrasarpiḥ pradhānaṃ siddhaṃ tailaṃ cāṇukalpena nasyam/
sarpiḥpānaṃ bhojanaṃ jāṅgalaiśca snehaḥ svedaḥ snaihikaścāpi dhūmaḥ//
Su.6.23.12 śeṣān rogān ghrāṇajān sanniyaccheduktaṃ teṣāṃ yadyathā saṃvidhānam//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre nāsāgatarogapratiṣedho nāma trayoviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //23//

div.head: caturviṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.24.1 athātaḥ pratiśyāyapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.24.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.24.3 nārīprasaṅgaḥ śiraso+abhitāpo dhūmo rajaḥ śītamatipratāpaḥ/
Su.6.24.4 cayaṃ gatā mūrdhani mārutādayaḥ pṛthak samastāśca tathaiva śoṇitam/
prakopyamāṇā vividhaiḥ prakopaṇairnṛṇāṃ pratiśyāyakarā bhavanti hi//
Su.6.24.5 śirogurutvaṃ kṣavathoḥ pravartanaṃ tathā+aṅgamardaḥ parihṛṣṭaromatā/
uṣṇaḥ sapītakaḥ srāvo ghrāṇāt sravati paittike//
sadhūmaṃ sahasā vahniṃ vamatīva ca mānavaḥ//
Su.6.24.9 kaphaḥ kaphakṛte ghrāṇācchuklaḥ śītaḥ sravenmuhuḥ/
Su.6.24.11 saṃpakvo vā+apyapakvo vā sa sarvaprabhavaḥ smṛtaḥ/
liṅgāni caiva sarveṣāṃ pīnasānāṃ ca sarvaje//
Su.6.24.12 raktaje tu pratiśyāye raktāsrāvaḥ pravartate/
Su.6.24.18 navaṃ pratiśyāyamapāsya sarvamupācaret sarpiṣa eva pānaiḥ/
Su.6.24.19 apacyamānasya hi pācanārthaṃ svedo hito+amlairahimaṃ ca bhojyam/
Su.6.24.21 nivātaśayyāsanaceṣṭanāni mūrdhno gurūṣṇaṃ ca tathaiva vāsaḥ/
tīkṣṇā virekāḥ śirasaḥ sadhūmā rūkṣaṃ †yavānnaṃ vijayā ca sevyā//
śokaṃ ca madyāni navāni caiva vivarjayet pīnasarogajuṣṭaḥ//
Su.6.24.25 vātike tu pratiśyāye pibet sarpiryathākramam/
Su.6.24.27 pariṣekān pradehāṃśca kuryādapi ca śītalān/
ubhe bale bṛhatyau ca viḍaṅgaṃ satrikaṇṭakam//
Su.6.24.34 sarpīṃṣi kaṭutiktāni tīkṣṇadhūmāḥ kaṭūni ca/
Su.6.24.36 mustā tejovatī pāṭhā kaṭphalaṃ kaṭukā vacā/
Su.6.24.37 tutthaṃ karañjabījaṃ ca lavaṇaṃ bhadradāru ca/
etaiḥ kṛtaṃ kaṣāyaṃ tu kavale saṃprayojayet//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre pratiśyāyapratiṣedho nāma caturviṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ //24//

div.head: pañcaviṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ/

lg.l: Su.6.25.5 yasyānimittaṃ śiraso rujaśca bhavanti tīvrā niśi cātimātram/
śītena rātrau ca bhavedviśeṣaḥ śirobhitāpaḥ sa tu pittakopāt//
Su.6.25.7 śirogalaṃ yasya kaphopadigdhaṃ guru pratiṣṭabdhamatho himaṃ ca/
śūnākṣikūṭaṃ vadanaṃ ca yasya śirobhitāpaḥ sa kaphaprakopāt//
Su.6.25.8 śirobhitāpe tritayapravṛtte sarvāṇi liṅgāni samudbhavanti†/
Su.6.25.11 ghrāṇācca gacchetsalilaṃ saraktaṃ śirobhitāpaḥ kṛmibhiḥ sa ghoraḥ/
sūryodayaṃ yā prati mandamandamakṣibhruvaṃ ruk samupaiti gāḍham//
Su.6.25.12 vivardhate cāṃśumatā sahaiva sūryāpavṛttau vinivartate ca/
śītena śāntiṃ labhate kadāciduṣṇena jantuḥ sukhamāpnuyācca//
Su.6.25.13 taṃ bhāskarāvartamudāharanti sarvātmakaṃ kaṣṭatamaṃ vikāram/
doṣāstu duṣṭāstraya eva manyāṃ saṃpīḍya ghāṭāsu rujāṃ sutīvrām//
Su.6.25.14 kurvanti sākṣibhruvi śaṅkhadeśe sthitiṃ karotyāśu viśeṣatastu/
gaṇḍasya pārśve tu karoti kampaṃ hanugrahaṃ locanajāṃśca rogān//
Su.6.25.15 anantavātaṃ tamudāharanti doṣatrayotthaṃ śiraso vikāram/
Su.6.25.17 rujaḥ sutīvrāḥ pratanoti mūrdhni viśeṣataścāpi hi śaṅkhayostu/
sukaṣṭamenaṃ khalu śaṅkhakākhyaṃ maharṣayo vedavidaḥ purāṇāḥ//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre śirorogavijñānīyo nāma pañcaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //25//

div.head: ṣaḍviṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.26.1 athātaḥ śirorogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.26.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.26.4 mudgān kulatthānmāṣāṃśca khādecca niśi kevalān/
Su.6.26.5 pibedvā payasā tailaṃ tatkalkaṃ vā+api mānavaḥ/
Su.6.26.8 varuṇādau gaṇe kṣuṇṇe kṣīramardhodakaṃ pacet/
Su.6.26.9 tato madhurakaiḥ siddhaṃ nasye tat pūjitaṃ haviḥ/
tasmin vipakve kṣīre tu peyaṃ sarpiḥ saśarkaram//
Su.6.26.10 dhūmaṃ cāsya yathākālaṃ snaihikaṃ yojayedbhiṣak/
Su.6.26.16 kṣīrasarpirhitaṃ nasyaṃ vasā vā jāṅgalā śubhā/
Su.6.26.20 śiro madhūkasāreṇa snigdhaṃ cāpi virecayet/
iṅgudasya tvacā vā+api meṣaśṛṅgasya† vā bhiṣak//
Su.6.26.21 ābhyāmeva kṛtāṃ vartiṃ dhūmapāne prayojayet/
sarpiḥpānaṃ viśeṣeṇa purāṇaṃ vā diśanti hi//
Su.6.26.25 kṣayaje kṣayamāsādya kartavyo bṛṃhaṇo vidhiḥ/
pāne nasye ca sarpiḥ syādvātaghnamadhuraiḥ śṛtam//
Su.6.26.26 kṣayakāsāpahaṃ cātra sarpiḥ pathyatamaṃ viduḥ/
Su.6.26.27 nasye hi śoṇitaṃ dadyāttena mūrcchanti jantavaḥ/
Su.6.26.28 teṣāṃ nirharaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tato mūrdhavirecanaiḥ/
Su.6.26.30 bhojanāni kṛmighnāni pānāni vividhāni ca/
Su.6.26.34 manaḥśilāvapīḍo vā madhunā candanena vā/
Su.6.26.36 eṣa eva prayoktavyaḥ śiroroge kaphātmake/
kṣīrasarpiḥ praśaṃsanti nasye pāne ca śaṅkhake//
Su.6.26.40 dūrvāṃ punarnavāṃ caiva lepe sādhvavacārayet/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate śālākyatantre śirorogapratiṣedho nāma ṣaṅviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //26//

div.head: saptaviṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.27.1 athāto navagrahākṛtivijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.27.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.27.4 skandagrahastu prathamaḥ skandāpasmāra eva ca/
Su.6.27.5 pūtanā śītanāmā ca tathaiva mukhamaṇḍikā/
trastān hṛṣṭāṃtarjitān tāḍitān vā pūjāhetorhiṃsyurete kumārān//
Su.6.27.7 aiśvaryasthāste na śakyā viśanto dehaṃ draṣṭuṃ mānuṣairviśvarūpāḥ/
āptaṃ vākyaṃ tatsamīkṣyābhidhāsye liṅgānyeṣāṃ yāni dehe bhavanti//
Su.6.27.8 śūnākṣaḥ† kṣatajasagandhikaḥ stanadviḍ vakrāsyo hatacalitaikapakṣmanetraḥ/
udvigraḥ sululitacakṣuralparodī skandārto bhavati ca gāḍhamuṣṭivarcāḥ//
Su.6.27.9 niḥsaṃjño bhavati punarbhavetsasaṃjñaḥ saṃrabdhaḥ karacaraṇaiśca nṛtyatīva/
viṇmūtre sṛjati vinadya jṛmbhamāṇaḥ phenaṃ ca prasṛjati tatsakhābhipannaḥ//
Su.6.27.10 srastāṅgo bhayacakito vihaṅgagandhiḥ saṃsrāvivraṇaparipīḍitaḥ samantāt/
sphoṭaiśca pracitatanuḥ sadāhapākairvijñeyo bhavati śiśuḥ kṣataḥ śakunyā//
Su.6.27.11 raktāsyo haritamalo+atipāṇḍudehaḥ śyāvo vā jvaramukhapākavedanātaḥ/
revatyā viyathitatanuśca karṇanāsaṃ mṛdgāti dhruvamabhipīḍitaḥ kumāraḥ//
Su.6.27.12 srastāṅgaḥ svapiti sukhaṃ divā na rātrau viḍ bhinnaṃ sṛjati ca kākatulyagandhiḥ/
Su.6.27.14 udvigro bhṛśamativepate prarudyāt saṃlīnaḥ ssvapiti ca yasya cāntrakūjaḥ/
visrāṅgo bhṛśamatisāryate ca yastaṃ jānīyādbhiṣagiha śītapūtanārtam//
Su.6.27.15 mlānāṅgaḥ surucirapāṇipādavaktro bahvāśī kaluṣasirāvṛtodaro yaḥ/
sodvego bhavati ca mūtratulyagandhiḥ sa jñeyaḥ śiśuriha vaktramaṇḍikārtaḥ//
Su.6.27.16 yaḥ phenaṃ vamati vinamyate ca madhye sodvegaṃ vilapati cordhvamīkṣamāṇaḥ/
jvaryeta pratatamatho vasāsagandhirniḥsaṃjño bhavati hi naigameṣajuṣṭaḥ//
Su.6.27.17 prastabdho yaḥ stanadveṣī muhyate cāviśanmuhuḥ/
Su.6.27.19 sarṣapān prakiretteṣāṃ tailairdīpaṃ† ca kārayet/
Su.6.27.21 namaḥ skandāya devāya grahādhipataye namaḥ/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre navagrahākṛtivijñānīyo nāma (prathamo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) saptaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //27//

div.head: aṣṭāviṃśatitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.28.1 athātaḥ skandhagrahapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.28.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.28.4 teṣāṃ mūleṣu siddhaṃ ca tailamabhyañjane hitam/
Su.6.28.5 devadāruṇi rāsnāyāṃ madhureṣu drumeṣu ca/
Su.6.28.6 sarṣapāḥ sarpanirmoko vacā kākādanī ghṛtam/
Su.6.28.8 raktāni mālyāni tathā patākā raktāśca gandhā vividhāśca bhakṣyāḥ/
ghaṇṭā ca devāya balirnivedyaḥ sukukkuṭaḥ skandagrahe hitāya//
Su.6.28.9 snānaṃ trirātraṃ niśi catvareṣu kuryāt puraṃ śāliyavairnavaistu/
Su.6.28.11 tapasāṃ tejasāṃ caiva yaśasāṃ vapuṣāṃ tathā/
nidhānaṃ yo+avyayo devaḥ sa te skandaḥ prasīdatu//
Su.6.28.13 devadevasya mahataḥ pāvakasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ/
gaṅgomākṛttikānāṃ ca sa te śarma prayacchatu//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre skandapratiṣedho nāmā (dvitīyo+adhyāyaḥ, ādito+)aṣṭāviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //28//

div.head: ekonatriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.29.1 athātaḥ skandāpasmārapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.29.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.29.3 bilvaḥ śirīṣo golomī surasādiśca yo gaṇaḥ/
Su.6.29.5 vipaktavyaṃ ghṛtaṃ cāpi pānīyaṃ payasā saha/
Su.6.29.7 anantāṃ kukkuṭīṃ bimbīṃ markaṭīṃ cāpi dhārayet/
Su.6.29.9 skandāpasmārasaṃjño yaḥ skandasya dayitaḥ sakhā/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre skandāpasmārapratiṣedho nāma (tṛtīyo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) ekonatriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //29//

div.head: triṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.30.1 athātaḥ śakunīpratīṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.30.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.30.7 lakṣmaṇāṃ sahadevāṃ ca bṛhatīṃ cāpi dhārayet/
kuryācca vividhāṃ pūjāṃ śakunyāḥ kusumaiḥ śubhaiḥ//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre śakunīpratiṣedho nāma (caturtho+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) triṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //30//

div.head: ekatriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.31.1 athāto revatīpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.31.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.31.3 aśvagandhā ca śṛṅgī ca sārivā sapunarnavā/
sahe tathā vidārī ca kaṣāyāḥ secane hitāḥ//
Su.6.31.4 tailamabhyañjane kāryaṃ kuṣṭhe sarjarase+api ca/
Su.6.31.6 kulatthāḥ śaṅkhacūrṇaṃ ca pradehaḥ sārvagandhikaḥ/
Su.6.31.8 satataṃ dhārayeccāpi kṛtaṃ vā pautrajīvikam/
śuklāḥ sumanaso lājāḥ payaḥ śālyodanaṃ tathā//
Su.6.31.11 upāsate yāṃ satataṃ devyo vividhabhūṣaṇāḥ/
revatī śuṣkanāmā yā sā te devī prasīdatu//

div.trailer: iti suśurtasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre revatīpratiṣedho nāma (pañcamo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) ekatriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//31//

div.head: dvātriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.32.1 athātaḥ pūtanāratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.32.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.32.4 vacā vayaḥsthā golomī haritālaṃ manaḥśilā/
Su.6.32.5 hitaṃ ghṛtaṃ tugākṣīryāṃ siddhaṃ madhurakeṣu ca/
karkaṭāsthi ghṛtaṃ cāpi dhūpanaṃ sarṣapaiḥ saha//
Su.6.32.8 kākādanīṃ citraphalāṃ bimbīṃ guñjāṃ ca dhārayet/
matsyaudanaṃ ca kurvīta kṛśarāṃ palalaṃ tathā/
pūjyā ca pūtanā devī balibhiḥ sopahārakaiḥ//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre (ṣaṣṭho+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) dvātriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //32//

div.head: trayastriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.33.1 athāto+andhapūtanāprasiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.33.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.33.6 purīṣaṃ kaukkuṭaṃ keśāṃścarma sarpatvacaṃ tathā/
Su.6.33.7 kukkuṭīṃ markaṭīṃ śimbīmanantāṃ cāpi dhārayet/
māṃsamāmaṃ tathā pakvaṃ śoṇitaṃ ca catuṣpathe//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre+andhapūtanāpratiṣedho nāma (saptamo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) trayastriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //33//

div.head: catustriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.34.1 athātaḥ śītapūtanāpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.34.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.34.3 kapitthaṃ suvahāṃ bimbīṃ tathā bilvaṃ pracībalam/
Su.6.34.4 bastamūtraṃ gavāṃ mūtraṃ mustaṃ ca suradāru ca/
Su.6.34.7 dhārayedapi lambāṃ ca guñjāṃ kākādanīṃ tathā/
Su.6.34.8 devyai deyaścopahāro vāruṇī rudhiraṃ tathā/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre śītapūtanāpratiṣedho nāma (aṣṭamo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) catustriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //34//

div.head: pañcatriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.35.1 athāto mukhamaṇḍikāpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.35.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: tailaṃ vasāṃ ca saṃyojya pacedabhyañjane śiśoḥ//
Su.6.35.5 madhūlikāyāṃ payasi tugākṣīryāṃ gaṇe tathā/
madhure pañcamūle ca kanīyasi ghṛtaṃ pacet//
Su.6.35.6 vacā sarjarasaḥ kuṣṭhaṃ sarpiścoddhūpanaṃ hitam/
Su.6.35.7 varṇakaṃ cūrṇakaṃ mālyamañjanaṃ pāradaṃ tathā/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre mukhamaṇḍikāpratiṣedho nāma (navamo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) pañcatriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //35//

div.head: ṣaṭtriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.36.1 athāto naigameṣapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.36.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: surā sabījaṃ dhānyāmlaṃ pariṣeke ca śasyate//
Su.6.36.6 vacāṃ vayaḥsthāṃ golomīṃ jaṭilāṃ cāpi dhārayet/
dhūpaḥ supte jane kāryo bālasya hitamicchatā//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre naigameṣapratiṣedho nāma (daśamo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) ṣaṭtriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //36//

div.head: saptatriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.37.1 athāto grahotpattimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.37.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.37.3 nava skandādayaḥ proktā bālānāṃ ya ime grahāḥ/
Su.6.37.5 strīvigrahā grahā ye tu nānārūpā mayeritāḥ/
Su.6.37.6 naigameṣastu pārvatyā sṛṣṭo meṣānano grahaḥ/
sa ca skandasakhā nāma viśākha iti cocyate//
Su.6.37.8 skandaḥ sṛṣṭo bhagavatā devena tripurāriṇā/
bibharti cāparāṃ saṃjñāṃ kumāra iti sa grahaḥ//
Su.6.37.11 tato bhagavati skande surasenāpatau kṛte/
Su.6.37.12 ūcuḥ prāñjalayaścainaṃ vṛttiṃ naḥ saṃvidhatsva vai/
Su.6.37.16 narāḥ samyak prayuktaiśca prīṇanti tridiveśvarān/
bhāgadheyaṃ vibhaktaṃ ca śeṣaṃ kiñcinna vidyate//
kuleṣu yeṣu nejyante devāḥ pitara eva ca//
Su.6.37.20 tatra vo vipulā vṛttiḥ pūjā caiva bhaviṣyati/
evaṃ grahāḥ samutpannā bālān gṛhṇanti cāpyataḥ//
vaikalyaṃ maraṇaṃ cāpi dhruvaṃ skandagrahe matam//
anyo vā sarvarūpastu na sādhyo graha ucyate//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre grahotpattyadhyāyo nāma (ekādaśo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) saptatriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //37//

div.head: aṣṭatriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.38.1 athāto yonivyāpatpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.38.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.38.4 sa duṣṭo yonimāsādya yonirogāya kalpate/
Su.6.38.6 jāyante bījadoṣācca daivācca śṛṇu tāḥ pṛthak/
udāvartā tathā vandhyā viplutā ca pariplutā//
Su.6.38.7 vātalā ceti vātotthāḥ pittotthā rudhirakṣarā/
vāminī snāṃsinī cāpi putraghnī pittalā ca yā//
Su.6.38.8 atyānandā ca yā yoniḥ karṇinī caraṇādvayam†/
śleṣmalā† ca kaphājjñeyā ṣaṇḍākhyā phalinī tathā//
Su.6.38.12 sadāhaṃ prakṣaratyasraṃ yasyāṃ sā lohitakṣarā/
Su.6.38.13 prasraṃsinī syandate tu kṣobhitā duḥprasūśca yā/
sthitaṃ sthitaṃ hanti garbhaṃ putraghnī raktasaṃsravāt//
Su.6.38.15 atyānandā na santoṣaṃ grāmyadharmeṇa gacchati/
Su.6.38.18 anārtavastanā ṣaṇḍī kharasparśā ca maithune/
Su.6.38.21 pratidoṣaṃ tu sādhyāsu snehādikrama iṣyate/
Su.6.38.22 karkaśāṃ śītalāṃ stabdhāmalpasparśāṃ ca maithune/
Su.6.38.24 dhāvanāni ca pathyāni kurvītāpūraṇāni ca/
Su.6.38.25 durgandhāṃ picchilāṃ cāpi cūrṇaiḥ pañcakaṣāyajaiḥ/
Su.6.38.29 pidhāya veśavāreṇa tato bandhaṃ samācaret/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kumāratantre yonivyāpatpratiṣedho nāma (dvādaśo+adhyāyaḥ, ādito+)aṣṭatriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ//38//
uttaratantre dvitīyaṃ kaumāratantraṃ samāptam //2//

div.head: ekonacatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.39.1 athāto jvarapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.39.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.39.5 samāsād vyāsataścaiva brūhi no bhiṣajāṃvara/
Su.6.39.7 tasmādupadravān kṛtsnān brūhi naḥ sacikitsitān/
Su.6.39.10 janmādau nidhane caiva prāyo viśati dehinam†/
Su.6.39.11 ṛte devamanuṣyebhyo nānyo viṣahate tu tam/
Su.6.39.13 śeṣāḥ sarve vipadyante tairyagyonā jvarārditāḥ/
Su.6.39.14 vikārā yugapadyasmin jvaraḥ sa parikīrtitaḥ/
doṣāḥ prakupitāḥ sveṣu kāleṣu svaiḥ prakopaṇaiḥ//
Su.6.39.19 janayatyatha vṛddhiṃ vā svavarṇaṃ ca tvagādiṣu/
nidrānāśaḥ kṣutaḥ stambho gātrāṇāṃ raukṣyameva ca//
Su.6.39.32 pralāpaḥ kaṭutā vaktre mūrcchā dāho madastṛṣā/
tṛṣṇā moho madaḥ stambho dāhaḥ śītaṃ hṛdi vyathā//
Su.6.39.37 nirbhugne kaluṣe netre karṇau śabdaruganvitau/
sarvaje sarvaliṅgāni viśeṣaṃ cātra me śṛṇu//
Su.6.39.44 api jāgrat svapan jantustandrāluśca pralāpavān/
Su.6.39.45 ojonirodhajaṃ tasya jānīyāt kuśalo bhisak/
saptame vidase prāpte daśame dvādaśe+api vā//
Su.6.39.46 punardhorataro bhūtvā praśamaṃ yāti hanti vā/
Su.6.39.47 tṛṣṇā mūrcchā bhramo dāhaḥ svapnanāśaḥ śirorujā/
staimityaṃ parvaṇaṃ bhedo nidrā gauravameva ca//
Su.6.39.54 tathā pralepako jñeyaḥ† śoṣiṇāṃ prāṇanāśanaḥ/
Su.6.39.55 kaphasthāneṣu vā doṣastiṣṭan dvitricaturṣu vā/
Su.6.39.56 paro hetuḥ svabhāvo vā viṣame kaiścidīritaḥ/
Su.6.39.57 vātādhikatvāt pravadanti tajjñāstṛtīyakaṃ† cāpi caturthakaṃ ca/
aupatyake madyasamudbhave ca hetuṃ jvare pittakṛtaṃ vadanti//
Su.6.39.58 pralepakaṃ vātabalāsakaṃ ca kaphādhikatvena vadanti tajjñāḥ/
mūrcchānubandhā viṣamajvarā ye prāyeṇa te dvandvasamutthitāstu//
Su.6.39.59 tvaksthau śleṣmānilau śītamādau janayato jvare/
Su.6.39.60 karotyādau tathā pittaṃ tvaksthaṃ dāhamatīva ca/
Su.6.39.61 dvāvetau dāhaśītādī jvarau saṃsargajau smṛtau/
rātryahnoḥ ṣaṭsu kāleṣu kīrtiteṣu tathā purā//
Su.6.39.63 prasahya viṣamo+abhyeti mānavaṃ bahudhā jvaraḥ/
sa cāpi viṣamo dehaṃ na kadācidvimuñcati//
Su.6.39.69 saptāhaṃ vā daśāhaṃ vā dvādaśāhamathāpi vā/
Su.6.39.72 velāṃ tāmeva kurvanti jvaravege muhurmuhuḥ/
Su.6.39.75 vegahānau praśāmyeta yathā+ambhaḥ sāgare tathā/
Su.6.39.76 yathādoṣaprakopaṃ tu tathā manyeta taṃ jvaram/
Su.6.39.77 abhaktaruk pipāsā ca todo mūrcchā balakṣayaḥ/
hṛdaye vedanā cāsya gātraṃ ca pariśuṣyati//
Su.6.39.79 bhayāt pralāpaḥ śokācca bhavet kopācca vepathuḥ/
rasasthe tu jvare liṅgaṃ dainyaṃ cāsyopajāyate//
pralāpaḥ piṭikā tṛṣṇā raktaprāpte jvare nṛṇām//
Su.6.39.86 bhṛśaṃ svedastṛṣā mūrcchā pralāpaśchardireva ca/
Su.6.39.87 bhedo+asthnāṃ kuñcanaṃ(kuñcajanaṃ) śvāso virekaśchardireva ca/
Su.6.39.88 tamaḥpraveśanaṃ hikkā kāsaḥ śaityaṃ vamistathā/
Su.6.39.89 śephasaḥ stabdhatā mokṣaḥ śukrasya tu viśeṣataḥ/
dagdhvendhanaṃ yathā vahnirdhātūn hatvā yathā viṣam//
Su.6.39.90 kṛtakṛtyo vrajecchāntiṃ dehaṃ hatvā tathā jvaraḥ/
Su.6.39.92 dvandvajaṃ dvandvajaireva doṣaiścāpi vadet kṛtam/
pāyayeta ghṛtaṃ svacchaṃ tataḥ sa labhate sukham//
Su.6.39.101 āmāśayasthe doṣe tu sotkleśe vamanaṃ param/
Su.6.39.103 alaṅghyāścāpi ye pūrvaṃ dvivraṇīye prakīrtitāḥ/
Su.6.39.105 prasannātmendriyaṃ kṣāmaṃ naraṃ vidyāt sulaṅghitam/
Su.6.39.108 sevyamānena toyena jvaraḥ śītena vardhate/
Su.6.39.110 annakāle hitā peyā yathāsvaṃ pācanaiḥ kṛtā/
Su.6.39.114 dvandvajeṣu tu saṃsṛṣṭaṃ dadyādatha vivarjayet/
Su.6.39.115 (tīkṣṇe jvare gurau dehe vibaddheṣu maleṣu ca/
sāmadoṣaṃ vijānīyājjvaraṃ pakvamato+ayathā†//) mṛdau jvare laghau dehe pracaleṣu maleṣu ca/
Su.6.39.118 svāpaḥ stambho gurutvaṃ ca gātrāṇāṃ vahnimārdavam/
Su.6.39.122 śodhanaṃ śamanīyaṃ tu karoti viṣamajvaram/
yadā koṣṭhānugāḥ pakvā vibaddhāḥ srotasāṃ malāḥ//
pakvo hyanirhṛto doṣo dehe tiṣṭhan mahātyayam//
Su.6.39.125 viṣamaṃ vā jvaraṃ kuryādbalavyāpadameva ca/
Su.6.39.126 prakkarma vamanaṃ cāsya kāryamāsthāpanaṃ tathā/
Su.6.39.127 kramaśaḥ baline deyaṃ vamanaṃ ślaiṣmike jvare/
Su.6.39.133 śuddhasyobhayato yasya jvaraḥ śāntiṃ na gacchati/
Su.6.39.135 klinnāṃ yavāgūṃ mandāgniṃ tṛṣārtaṃ pāyayennaram/
Su.6.39.137 dīptāgniṃ bhojayet prājño naraṃ māṃsarasaudanam/
Su.6.39.138 sa eva sitayā yuktaḥ śītaḥ pittajvare hitaḥ/
pipāsārtaḥ sadāho vā payasā sa sukhī bhavet//
sa kṣīṇaḥ kṛcchratāṃ yāti yātyasādhyatvameva ca//
Su.6.39.148 tasmādrakṣedbalaṃ puṃsāṃ bale sati hi jīvitam/
Su.6.39.149 na tu tasyāhitaṃ bhuktamāyuṣe vā sukhāya vā/
jvaritānāṃ prakopaṃ tu yadā yāti samīraṇaḥ//
na seveta jvarotsṛṣṭo yāvanna balavān bhavet//
Su.6.39.165 na jātu †snāpayet prājñaḥ sahasā jvarakarśitam/
Su.6.39.168 ataḥ saṃśamanīyāni kaṣāyāṇi nibodha me/
Su.6.39.170 śṛtaṃ śītakaṣāyaṃ vā guḍūcyāḥ peyameva tu/
Su.6.39.174 guḍūcyāḥ svaraso grāhyaḥ śatāvaryāśca tatsamaḥ/
Su.6.39.176 śarkarāmadhuro hanti kaṣāyaḥ paittikaṃ jvaram/
Su.6.39.180 suśītaiḥ śamayettṛṣṇāṃ pravṛddhāṃ dāhameva ca/
Su.6.39.181 vāmayetpāyayitvā tu tena tṛṣṇā praśāmyati/
Su.6.39.184 kṣaudreṇa yuktaṃ pibato jvaradāhau praśāmyataḥ/
Su.6.39.186 vairasye dhārayetkalkaṃ gaṇḍūṣaṃ ca tathā hitam/
saptacchadaṃ guḍūcīṃ ca nimbaṃ sphūrjakameva ca//
Su.6.39.187 kvāthayitvā pibet kvāthaṃ sakṣaudraṃ kaphaje jvare/
Su.6.39.188 kauṭajaṃ ca phalaṃ hanyāt sevyamānaṃ kaphajvaram/
Su.6.39.189 kuṣṭhamindrayavān mūrvāṃ paṭolaṃ cāpi sādhitam/
mustena ca kṛtaḥ kvāthaḥ pīto hanyāt kaphajvaram//
Su.6.39.193 nāgaraṃ dhānyakaṃ bhārgīmabhayāṃ suradāru ca/
Su.6.39.196 kvātho madhuyutaḥ pīto hanti pittakaphajvaram/
Su.6.39.197 kaṣāyo nāśayet pītaḥ śleṣmapittabhavaṃ jvaram/
Su.6.39.200 niṣkvāthya vātapittotthe taṃ kvāthaṃ saguḍaṃ pibet/
Su.6.39.201 kaṣāyaḥ sādhitaḥ pīto vātapittajvaraṃ jayet/
Su.6.39.203 pacet kṣīrāvaśiṣṭaṃ tu taddhi sarvajvarāpaham/
Su.6.39.204 tat kṣīraśeṣaṃ kvathitaṃ peyaṃ sarvajvarāpaham/
Su.6.39.206 picumandaḥ paṭolī ca devadāru nidigdhikā/
Su.6.39.207 avipaktiṃ prasekaṃ ca śophaṃ kāsamarocakam/
Su.6.39.208 anantāṃ bālakaṃ mustāṃ nāgaraṃ kaṭurohiṇīm/
Su.6.39.209 eṣa sarvajvarān hanti dīpayatyāśu cānalam/
Su.6.39.210 ekaśo vā dviśo vā+api jvaraghnāni prayojayet/
Su.6.39.211 śāntiṃ nayettrivṛccāpi sakṣaudrā prabalaṃ jvaram/
jvare tu viṣame kāryamūrdhvaṃ cādhaśca śodhanam//
Su.6.39.215 harītakyāśca sarvo+ayaṃ trividho yoga iṣyate†/
Su.6.39.237 tithau praśaste nakṣatre sādhakasyāturasya ca/
Su.6.39.238 dattaṃ sarvajvarān hanti mahākalyāṇakaṃ tvidam//
gavyaṃ dadhi ca mūtraṃ ca kṣīraṃ sarpiḥ śakṛdrasaḥ//
Su.6.39.242 viḍaṅgaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ cavyaṃ suradāru tathaiva ca/
balayā+atha paraṃ pācyaṃ guḍūcyā tadvadeva tu//
Su.6.39.244 jīrṇajvare ca śophe ca pāṇḍuroge ca pūjitam/
etenaiva tu kalpena ghṛtaṃ pañcāvikaṃ pacet/
śṛtaṃ payaḥ śarkarā ca pippalyo madhusarpiṣī//
ṣaḍguṇena ca takreṇa siddhaṃ tailaṃ jvarāntakṛt//
madyaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pāyayeta ghṛtaṃ vā jvaranāśanam//
Su.6.39.261 purāṇaṃ vā ghṛtaṃ kāmamudāraṃ vā virecanam/
Su.6.39.263 baiḍālaṃ vā śakṛdyojyaṃ vepamānasya dhūpanam/
Su.6.39.264 udaroktāni sarpīṣi yānyuktāni purā mayā/
kalpoktaṃ cājitaṃ sarpiḥ sevyamānaṃ jvaraṃ jayet//
Su.6.39.269 jayet kaṣāyaṃ ca hitaṃ sarvagandhakṛtaṃ tathā/
Su.6.39.270 yavānnavikṛtiḥ sarpirmadyaṃ ca viṣame hitam/
prahlādaṃ cāsya vijñāya tāḥ strīrapanayet punaḥ//
Su.6.39.283 dāhajvarārtaṃ matimān vāmayet kṣiprameva ca/
Su.6.39.286 lipte+aṅge dāhatṛṇmūrcchāḥ praśāmyanti ca sarvaśaḥ/
Su.6.39.288 nyagrodhādirgaṇo yastu kākolyādiśca yo gaṇaḥ/
Su.6.39.293 prahlādaṃ cāsya vijñāya tāḥ strīrapanayet punaḥ/
hitaṃ ca bhojayedannaṃ tathā++āpnoti sukhaṃ mahat//
Su.6.39.294 pittajvaroktaṃ śamanaṃ vireko+†anyaddhitaṃ ca yat/
Su.6.39.297 madhukaṃ rajanī mustaṃ dāḍimaṃ sāmlavetasam/
Su.6.39.298 tvacaṃ vyāghranakhaṃ caiva mātuluṅgaraso madhu/
Su.6.39.301 līḍvā cūrṇāni madhunā sarpiṣā ca jayedvamim/
Su.6.39.302 lihan jvarārtastriphalāṃ pippalīṃ ca samākṣikām/
kāse śvāse ca madhunā sarpiṣā ca sukhī bhavet//
Su.6.39.303 vidārī dāḍimaṃ lodhraṃ dadhitthaṃ bījapūrakam/
vairasye dhārayet kalkaṃ gaṇḍūṣaṃ ca yathāhitam//
śūnye mūrdhni hitaṃ nasyaṃ jīvanīyaśṛtaṃ ghṛtam//
Su.6.39.307 pakve pittajvare rakte cordhvage vepathau tathā/
Su.6.39.309 †avekṣya doṣaṃ prāṇaṃ ca yathāsvaṃ cānuvāsanāḥ/
Su.6.39.312 supūtaṃ śītalaṃ bastiṃ dahyamānāya dāpayet/
saṃsarge sannipāte ca saṃsṛṣṭā bastayo hitāḥ//
Su.6.39.316 vinā tailaṃ ta eva syuryojyā mārutaje jvare/
Su.6.39.317 paittike madhuraistiktaiḥ siddhaṃ sarpiśca pūjyate/
Su.6.39.318 hṛtāvaśeṣaṃ pittaṃ tu tvaksthaṃ janayati jvaram/
Su.6.39.320 ghṛtaṃ dvādaśarātrāttu deyaṃ sarvajvareṣu ca/
tenāntareṇāśayaṃ svaṃ gatā doṣā bhavanti hi//
Su.6.39.321 dhānūn prakṣobhayan doṣo mokṣakāle balīyate/
Su.6.39.322 laghutvaṃ śirasaḥ svedo mukhamāpāṇḍu pāki ca/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre jvarapratiṣedho nāma (prathamo+adhyāyaḥ ādita) ekonacatvāriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //39//

div.head: catvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.40.1 athāto+atīsārapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.40.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.40.6 saṃśamyāpāṃdhāturantaḥ kṛśānuṃ varcomiśro mārutena praṇunnaḥ/
vṛddho+atīvādhaḥ saratyeṣa yasmādvyādhiṃ ghoraṃ taṃ tvatīsāramāhuḥ//
Su.6.40.7 ekaikaśaḥ sarvaśaścāpi doṣaiḥ śokenānyaḥ ṣaṣṭha āmena coktaḥ/
Su.6.40.8 doṣāvasthāstasya naikaprakārāḥ kāle kāle vyādhitasyodbhavanti/
Su.6.40.10 varco muñcatyalpamalpaṃ saphenaṃ rūkṣaṃ śyāvaṃ sānilaṃ mārutena/
Su.6.40.11 pittāt pītaṃ nīlamālohitaṃ vā tṛṣṇāmūrcchādāhapākajvarārtaḥ/
Su.6.40.12 śuklaṃ sāndraṃ śleṣmaṇā śleṣmayuktaṃ bhaktadveṣī niḥsvanaṃ hṛṣṭaromā/
Su.6.40.14 koṣṭhaṃ gatvā kṣobhayatyasya raktaṃ taccādhastāt kākaṇantīprakāśam/
varcomiśraṃ niḥpurīṣaṃ sagandhaṃ nirgandhaṃ vā sāryate tena kṛcchrāt//
Su.6.40.15 śokotpanno duścikitsyo+atimātraṃ rogo vaidyaiḥ kaṣṭa eṣa pradiṣṭaḥ/
āmājīrṇopadrutāḥ kṣobhayantaḥ koṣṭhaṃ doṣāḥ saṃpraduṣṭāḥ sabhaktam//
Su.6.40.16 nānāvarṇaṃ naikaśaḥ sārayanti kṛcchrājjantoḥ ṣaṣṭhamenaṃ vadanti/
Su.6.40.18 etānyeva tu liṅgāni viparītāni yasya tu/
lāghavaṃ ca manuṣyasya tasya pakvaṃ vinirdiśet//
mañjiṣṭhābhaṃ mastuluṅgopamaṃ vā visraṃ śītaṃ pretagandhyañjanābham//
Su.6.40.20 rājīmadvā candrakaiḥ santataṃ vā pūyaprakhyaṃ kardamābhaṃ tathoṣṇam/
hanyādetadyat pratīpaṃ bhavecca kṣīṇaṃ hanyuścopasargāḥ prabhūtāḥ//
Su.6.40.24 āmapakvakramaṃ hitvā nātisāre kriyā yataḥ/
Su.6.40.27 kāryaṃ ca vamanasyānte pradravaṃ laghubhojanam/
Su.6.40.28 anena vidhinā cāmaṃ yasya vai nopaśāmyati/
haridrādiṃ vacādiṃ vā pibet prātaḥ sa mānavaḥ//
Su.6.40.29 āmātīsāriṇāṃ kāryaṃ nādau saṃgrahaṇaṃ nṛṇām/
Su.6.40.33 stokaṃ stokaṃ vibaddhaṃ vā saśūlaṃ yo+atisāryate/
Su.6.40.34 āme ca laṅghanaṃ śastamādau pācanameva vā/
Su.6.40.36 abhayā dhānyakaṃ mustaṃ pippalī nāgaraṃ vacā/
nāgaraṃ dhānyakaṃ mustaṃ vālakaṃ bilvameva ca//
Su.6.40.37 mustaṃ parpaṭakaṃ śuṇṭhī vacā prativiṣā+abhayā/
Su.6.40.39 mūrvā nirdahanī pāṭhā tryūṣaṇaṃ gajapippalī/
Su.6.40.40 elā sāvarakaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haridre kauṭajā yavāḥ/
meṣaśṛṅgī tvagele ca kṛmighnaṃ vṛkṣakāṇi ca//
Su.6.40.41 vṛkṣādanī vīratarurbṛhatyau dve sahe tathā/
aralutvak taindukī ca dāḍimī kauṭajī śamī//
Su.6.40.42 pāṭhā tejovatī mustaṃ pippalī kauṭajaṃ phalam/
paṭolaṃ(paṭolī) dīpyako bilvaṃ haridre devadāru ca//
Su.6.40.43 viḍaṅgamabhayā pāṭhā śṛṅgaveraṃ ghanaṃ vacā/
niṣkvāthān vā pibedeṣāṃ sukhoṣṇān sādhu sādhitān//
Su.6.40.50 mustaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ ca pibedvā+api sukhāmbunā/
citrakaṃ śiṃśapā pāṭhā śārṅgeṣṭā lavaṇāni ca//
Su.6.40.53 vacā guḍūcīkāṇḍāni yogo+ayaṃ paramo mataḥ/
ete sukhāmbunā yogā deyāḥ paśca satāṃ matāḥ//
Su.6.40.60 mudgādiṣu ca yūṣāḥ syurdravyairetaiḥ susaṃskṛtāḥ/
rasāñjanaṃ haridre dve bījāni kuṭajasya ca//
Su.6.40.64 candanaṃ vālakaṃ mustaṃ bhūnimbaṃ sadurālabham/
Su.6.40.65 pāṭhā mustaṃ haridre dve pippalī kauṭajaṃ phalam/
Su.6.40.70 āmrāsthimadhyaṃ lodhraṃ ca bilvamadhyaṃ priyaṅgavaḥ/
Su.6.40.71 catvāra ete yogāḥ syuḥ pakvātīsāranāśanāḥ/
Su.6.40.72 maustaṃ kaṣāyamekaṃ vā peyaṃ madhusamāyutam/
Su.6.40.73 padmāṃ samaṅgāṃ madhukaṃ bilvajambūśalāṭu ca/
payo ghṛtaṃ ca madhu ca pibecchūlairabhidrutaḥ//
Su.6.40.83 svinnamuddhṛtya niṣpīḍya rasamādāya taṃ tataḥ/
tittiriṃ luñcitaṃ samyak niṣkṛṣṭāntraṃ tu pūrayet//
Su.6.40.92 aralutvak priyaṅguṃ ca madhukaṃ dāḍimāṅkurān/
Su.6.40.98 pānīyāni ca tṛṣṇāsu dravyeṣveteṣu buddhimān/
Su.6.40.101 cirotthiteṣu tat peyamapāṃ bhāgaistribhiḥ śṛtam/
Su.6.40.102 hitaḥ snehavireko vā bastayaḥ picchilāśca ye/
Su.6.40.106 gaurave vamanaṃ pathyaṃ yasya syāt prabalaḥ kaphaḥ/
Su.6.40.107 saṃpakve bahudoṣe ca vibandhe mūtraśodhanaiḥ/
Su.6.40.111 alpālpaṃ bahuśo raktaṃ sarugya upaveśyate/
Su.6.40.117 jvaraṃ śūlaṃ tṛṣāṃ dāhaṃ gudapākaṃ ca dāruṇam/
yo raktaṃ śakṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ paścādvā pratisāryate//
Su.6.40.118 sa pallavairvaṭādīnaṃ sasarpiḥ sādhitaṃ payaḥ/
Su.6.40.120 kṣīre vimṛditāḥ pītāḥ sakṣaudrā raktanāśanāḥ/
Su.6.40.122 pibet padmāṃ ca dugdhena chāgenāsṛkpraśāntaye/
Su.6.40.123 tilāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ sayaṣṭyāhvāḥ samaṅgā cotpalāni ca/
Su.6.40.124 kacchurā tilakalkaśca yogāścatvāra eva ca/
Su.6.40.125 drave sarakte sravati bālabilvaṃ saphāṇitam/
sakṣaudratailaṃ prāgeva lihyādāśu hitaṃ hi tat//
Su.6.40.126 kośakāraṃ ghṛte bhṛṣṭaṃ lājacūrṇaṃ sitā madhu/
Su.6.40.129 gudāpāke ca ye uktāste+atrāpi vidhayaḥ smṛtāḥ/
Su.6.40.132 dīptāgnirniṣpurīṣo yaḥ sāryate phenilaṃ śakṛt/
Su.6.40.135 khādedvipācya seveta mṛdvannaṃ śakṛtaḥ kṣaye/
Su.6.40.137 dadhnaḥ saraśca yamake bhṛṣṭo varcaḥkṣaye hitaḥ/
Su.6.40.138 vāyuḥ pravṛddho nicitaṃ balāsaṃ nudatyadhastādahitāśanasya/
pravāhamāṇasya muhurmalāktaṃ pravāhikāṃ tāṃ pravadanti tajjñāḥ//
Su.6.40.139 pravāhikā vātakṛtā saśūlā pittāt sadāhā sakaphā kaphācca/
saśoṇitā śoṇitasaṃbhavā tu tāḥ sneharūkṣaprabhavā matāstu//
Su.6.40.140 tāsāmatīsāravadādiśecca liṅgaṃ kramaṃ cāmavipakvatāṃ ca/
na śāntimāyāti vilaṅghanairyā yogairudīrṇā yadi pācanairvā//
Su.6.40.141 tāṃ kṣīramevāśu śṛtaṃ nihanti tailaṃ tilāḥ picchilabastayaśca/
ārdraiḥ kuśaiḥ saṃpariveṣṭitāni vṛntānyathārdrāṇi hi śālmalīnām//
Su.6.40.142 pkvāni samyak puṭapākayogenāpothya tebhyo rasamādadīta/
kṣīraṃ śṛtaṃ tailahavirvimiśraṃ kalkena yaṣṭīmadhukasya vā+api//
Su.6.40.144 kṣīreṇa cāsthāpanamagryamuktaṃ tailena yuñjyādanuvāsanaṃ ca/
vātaghnavarge lavaṇeṣu caiva tailaṃ ca siddhaṃ hitamannapāne//
Su.6.40.145 lodhraṃ viḍaṃ bilvaśalāṭu caiva lihyācca tailena kaṭutrikāḍhyam/
Su.6.40.146 sutaptakupyakvathitena vā+api kṣīreṇa śītena madhuplutena/
khādecca matsyān rasamāpnuyācca vātaghnasiddhaṃ saghṛtaṃ satailam//
Su.6.40.148 eṇāvyajānāṃ tu vaṭapravālaiḥ siddhāni sārdhaṃ piśitāni khādet/
medhyasya(medyasya) siddhaṃ tvatha vā+api raktaṃ bastasya dadhnā ghṛtatailayuktam//
Su.6.40.149 khādet pradehaiḥ śikhilāvajairvā bhuñjīta yūṣairdadhibhiśca mukhyaiḥ/
māṣān susiddhān ghṛtamaṇḍayuktān khādecca dadhnā maricopadaṃśān//
Su.6.40.150 mahāruje mūtrakṛcchre bhiṣag bastiṃ pradāpayet/
Su.6.40.151 sa bastiḥ śamayettasya raktaṃ dāhamatho jvaram/
Su.6.40.152 rātrāvahani vā nityaṃ rujārto yo bhavennaraḥ/
Su.6.40.153 praśānte mārute cāpi śāntiṃ yāti pravāhikā/
Su.6.40.154 pāṭhājamodākuṭajotpalaṃ† ca śuṇṭhī samā māgadhikāśca piṣṭāḥ/
sukhāmbupītāḥ śamayanti rogaṃ medhyāṇḍasiddhaṃ saghṛtaṃ payo vā//
Su.6.40.155 śuṇṭhīṃ ghṛtaṃ sakṣavakaṃ satailaṃ vipācya līḍhvā++āmayamāśu hanyāt/
Su.6.40.156 bilvānvitā pathyatamā yavāgūrdhāroṣṇadugdhasya tathā ca pānam/
Su.6.40.157 hitāya nityaṃ vitaredvibhajya yogāṃśca tāṃstān bhiṣagapramattaḥ//
jvare caivātisāre ca yavāgūḥ sarvadā hitā//
Su.6.40.159 rūkṣājjāte kriyā snigdhā rūkṣā snehanimittaje/
Su.6.40.161 samavāye tu doṣāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ pittamupācaret/
Su.6.40.162 yasyoccāraṃ vinā mūtraṃ samyagvāyuśca gacchati/
Su.6.40.163 karmajā vyādhayaḥ keciddoṣajāḥ santi cāpare/
Su.6.40.165 teṣāmalpanidānā ye pratikaṣṭā bhavanti ca/
Su.6.40.169 ṣaṣṭhī pittadharā nāma yā kalā parikīrtitā/
Su.6.40.170 grahaṇyā balamagnirhi sa cāpi grahaṇīṃ śritaḥ/
Su.6.40.172 pakvaṃ vā sarujaṃ pūti muhurbaddhaṃ muhurdravam/
Su.6.40.174 atha jāte bhavejjantuḥ śūnapādakaraḥ kṛśaḥ/
Su.6.40.180 takreṇa vā+atha takraṃ vā kevalaṃ hitamucyate/
Su.6.40.181 cūrṇaṃ hiṅgvādikaṃ cātra ghṛtaṃ vā plīhanāśanam/
Su.6.40.182 caturguṇena dadhnā ca ghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ hitaṃ bhavet/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre+atisārapratiṣedho nāma (dvitīyo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ/) catvāriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //40//

div.head: ekacatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.41.1 athātaḥ śoṣapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.41.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.41.6 sa vyastairjāyate doṣairiti kecidvadanti hi/
eka eva mataḥ śoṣaḥ sannipātātmako hyataḥ//
Su.6.41.8 udrekāttatra liṅgāni doṣāṇāṃ nipatanti hi/
kṣīyante dhātavaḥ sarve tataḥ śuṣyanti mānavaḥ//
Su.6.41.11 bhaktadveṣo jvaraḥ śvāsaḥ kāsaḥ śoṇitadarśanam/
tasyorasi kṣate raktaṃ pūyaḥ śleṣmā ca gacchati//
Su.6.41.27 na tatra doṣaliṅgānāṃ samastānāṃ nipātanam/
kṣayā eva hi te jñeyāḥ pratyekaṃ dhātusaṃjñitāḥ//
Su.6.41.28 cikitsitaṃ tu teṣāṃ hi prāguktaṃ dhātusaṃkṣaye//
śoṣe bhaviṣyati bhavanti sa cāpi jantuḥ śuklekṣaṇe bhavati māṃsaparo ririṃsuḥ//
taṃ vāhayanti sa nadīrvijalāśca paśyecchuṣkāṃstarūn pavanadhūmadavārditāṃśca//
Su.6.41.33 snigdhasya mṛdu kartavyamūrdhvaṃ cādhaśca śodhanam/
Su.6.41.35 vyavāyaśoṣiṇaṃ prāyo bhajante vātajā gadāḥ/
Su.6.41.37 deyāni māṃsāni ca jāṅgalāni mudgāḍhakīsūparasāśca† hṛdyāḥ/
Su.6.41.38 māṃsopadaṃśāṃśca pibedariṣṭān mārdvīkayuktān madirāśca sevyāḥ/
Su.6.41.39 khādet pibet sarpirajāvikaṃ vā kṛśo yavāgvā saha bhaktakāle/
Su.6.41.40 māṃsādamāṃseṣu ghṛtaṃ ca siddhaṃ śosāpahaṃ kṣaudrakaṇāsametam/
tadutthitaṃ kṣīraghṛtaṃ sitāḍhyaṃ prātaḥ pibedvā+api payonupānam//
Su.6.41.43 utsādane cāpi turaṅgagandhā yojyā yavāścaiva punarnave ca/
kṛtsne vṛṣe tatkusumaiśca siddhaṃ sarpiḥ pibetkṣaudrayutaṃ hitāśī//
Su.6.41.44 yakṣmāṇametat prabalaṃ ca kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ ca hanyādapi pāṇḍutāṃ ca/
śakṛdrasā gośvagajāvyajānāṃ kvāthā mitāścāpi tathaiva bhāgaiḥ//
bhāgān daśautān vipacedvidhijño dattvā trivargaṃ madhuraṃ ca kṛtsnam//
Su.6.41.46 kaṭutrikaṃ caiva sabhadradāru ghṛtottamaṃ yakṣmanivāraṇāya/
dve pañcamūlyau varuṇaṃ karañjaṃ bhallātakaṃ bilvapunarnave ca//
Su.6.41.47 yavān kulatthān badarāṇi bhārgīṃ pāṭhāṃ hutāśaṃ samahīkadambam/
kṛtvā kaṣāyaṃ vipaceddhi tasya ṣaḍbhirhi pātrairghṛtapātramekam//
Su.6.41.48 vyoṣaṃ mahāvṛkṣapayo+abhayāṃ ca cavyaṃ surākhyaṃ lavaṇottamaṃ ca/
etaddhi śoṣaṃ jaṭharāṇi caiva hanyāt pramehāṃśca sahānilena//
Su.6.41.51 paktvā jale tena paceddhi sarpistasmin susiddhe tvavatārite ca/
triṃśatpalānyatra sitopalāyā dattvā tugākṣīripalāni ṣaṭ ca//
Su.6.41.52 prasthe ghṛtasya dviguṇaṃ ca dadyāt kṣaudraṃ tato manthahataṃ vidadhyāt/
palaṃ palaṃ prātarataḥ pralihya paścāt pibet kṣīramatandritaśca//
Su.6.41.53 etaddhi medhyaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ cakṣuṣyamāyuṣyamatho yaśasyam/
yakṣmāṇamāśu vyapahanti caitat pāṇḍvāmayaṃ caiva bhagandaraṃ ca//
na cātra kiṃcit parivarjanīyaṃ rasāyanaṃ caitadupāsyamānam//
Su.6.41.55 plīhodaroktaṃ vihitaṃ ca sarpistrīṇyeva cānyāni hitāni cātra/
Su.6.41.57 rasonayogaṃ vidhivat kṣayārtaḥ kṣīreṇa vā nāgabalāprayogam/
Su.6.41.58 śokaṃ striyaṃ krodhamasūyanaṃ ca tyajedudārān viṣayān bhajeta/
vaidyān dvijātīṃstridaśān gurūśca vācaśca puṇyāḥ śṛṇuyādbijebhyaḥ//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre (tṛtīyo+adhyāyaḥ, ādita) ekacatvāriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //41//

div.head: dvicatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.42.1 athāto gulmapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.42.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: janayanti nṛṇāṃ gulmaṃ sa pañcavidha ucyate//
Su.6.42.4 hṛdbastyorantare granthiḥ saṃcārī yadi vā+acalaḥ/
cayāpacayavān vṛttaḥ sa gulma iti kīrtitaḥ//
Su.6.42.5 pañca gulmāśrayā nṝṇāṃ pārśve hṛnnābhibastayaḥ/
Su.6.42.7 antaḥ sarati yasmācca na pākamupayātyataḥ/
Su.6.42.8 puruṣāṇāṃ tathā strīṇāṃ jñeyo raktena cāparaḥ/
Su.6.42.10 hṛtkukṣiśūlaṃ mukhakaṇṭhaśoṣo vāyornirodho viṣamāgnitā ca/
te te vikārāḥ pavanātmakāśca bhavanti gulme+anilasaṃbhave tu//
pittasya liṅgānyakhilāni yāni pittātmake tāni bhavanti gulme//
kaphasya liṅgāni ca yāni tāni bhavanti gulme kaphasaṃbhave tu//
Su.6.42.13 sarvātmakaḥ sarvavikārayuktaḥ so+asādhya uktaḥ kṣatajaṃ pravakṣye/
navaprasūtā+ahitabhojanā yā yā cāmagarbhaṃ visṛjedṛtau† vā//
Su.6.42.14 vāyurhi tasyāḥ parigṛhya raktaṃ karoti gulmaṃ sarujaṃ sadāham/
paittasya liṅgena samānaliṅgaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ cāpyaparaṃ nibodha//
Su.6.42.15 na spandate nodarameti vṛddhiṃ bhavanti liṅgāni ca garbhiṇīnām/
Su.6.42.22 ānūpaudakamajjāno vasā tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ dadhi/
Su.6.42.23 jāṅgalaikaśaphānāṃ tu vasā sarpiśca paittike/
Su.6.42.34 dadhi sauvīrakaṃ sarpiḥ kvāthau mudgakulatthajau/
Su.6.42.35 sauvarcalaṃ sarjikāṃ ca devadārvatha saindhavam/
cūrṇaṃ hiṅgvādikaṃ vā+api ghṛtaṃ vā plīhanāśanam//
tasya mātrāṃ pibeddadhnā surayā sarpiṣā+api vā//
Su.6.42.47 citrakaṃ ca jaladroṇe paktvā pādāvaśeṣitam/
Su.6.42.50 lavaṇaṃ vṛkṣabījaṃ ca tulyaṃ syādanavo guḍaḥ/
Su.6.42.52 hṛdrogaṃ grahaṇīdoṣaṃ pāṇḍurogaṃ ca dāruṇam/
Su.6.42.53 gulme raktaṃ jalaukobhiḥ sirāmokṣeṇa vā haret/
Su.6.42.54 kaṭutrikasamāyuktā hitāḥ pāne tu gulminām/
peyā vātaharaiḥ siddhāḥ kaulatthāḥ saṃskṛtā rasāḥ//
Su.6.42.55 khalāḥ sapañcamūlāśca gulmināṃ bhojane hitāḥ/
Su.6.42.60 kṛtvā pāyau vidhātavyā vartayo maricottarāḥ/
Su.6.42.62 ūrdhvavātaṃ manuṣyaṃ ca gulminaṃ na nirūhayet/
Su.6.42.63 gugguluṃ trivṛtāṃ dantīṃ dravantīṃ saindhavaṃ vacām/
Su.6.42.64 evaṃ pīlūni †bhṛṣṭāni pibet salavaṇāni tu/
Su.6.42.65 yuktā hanti surā gulmaṃ śīghraṃ kāle prayojitā/
Su.6.42.70 yavānīṃ ca haridrāṃ ca viḍaṅgānyamlavetasam/
Su.6.42.73 yathākramaṃ vimiśrāṃśca dvandve sarvāṃśca sarvaje/
Su.6.42.76 na khādedālukaṃ gulmī madhurāṇi phalāni ca/
Su.6.42.77 nidānaṃ tasya vakṣyāmi rūpaṃ ca sacikitsitam/
Su.6.42.80 vāyuḥ prakupitaḥ koṣṭhe śūlaṃ saṃjanayedbhṛśam/
Su.6.42.84 tṛṣṇā dāho mado mūrcchā tīvraṃ śūlaṃ tathaiva ca/
Su.6.42.88 śūlānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ cikitsāṃ tu nibodha me/
Su.6.42.89 tasya śūlābhipannasya sveda eva sukhāvahaḥ/
Su.6.42.90 trivṛcchākena vā snigdhamuṣṇaṃ bhiñjīta bhojanam/
Su.6.42.91 vaihaṅgāṃśca rasān snigdhān jāṅgalān śūlapīḍitaḥ/
Su.6.42.92 surā sauvīrakaṃ cukraṃ mastūdaśvittathā dadhi/
Su.6.42.95 madyena vātajaṃ śūlaṃ kṣiprameva praśāmyati/
Su.6.42.96 pippalyaḥ pippalīmūlaṃ saindhavaṃ ceti cūrṇayet/
tāni cūrṇāni payasā pibet kāmbalikena vā//
Su.6.42.98 tathā badarayūṣeṇa bhāvitāni punaḥ punaḥ/
Su.6.42.99 saha dāḍimasāreṇa vartiḥ kāryā bhiṣagjitā/
Su.6.42.100 guḍatailena vā līḍhā pītā madyena vā punaḥ/
Su.6.42.104 sa sukhaṃ chardayitvā tu pītvā śītodakaṃ naraḥ/
Su.6.42.106 guḍaḥ śāliryavāḥ kṣīraṃ sarpiḥpānaṃ virecanam/
Su.6.42.107 rasān seveta pittaghnān pittalāni vivarjayet/
Su.6.42.109 aśane bhuktamātre tu prakopaḥ ślaiṣmikasya ca/
Su.6.42.110 rūkṣaḥ svedaḥ prayojyaḥ syādanyāścoṣṇāḥ kriyā hitāḥ/
Su.6.42.111 pāṭhāṃ vacāṃ trikaṭukaṃ tathā kaṭukarohiṇīm/
Su.6.42.113 dadyācchṛgālavinnāṃ ca sahadevāṃ tathaiva ca/
Su.6.42.114 etat saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāraṃ jaladroṇe vipācayet/
Su.6.42.115 vātikaṃ paittikaṃ vā+api ślaiṣmikaṃ sānnipātikam/
Su.6.42.116 pippalī svarjikākṣāro yavāścitraka eva ca/
Su.6.42.120 tatra puṣkaramūlāni hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ viḍam/
saindhavaṃ tumburuṃ pathyāṃ cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tu pāyayet//
sarpiḥ plīhodaroktaṃ vā ghṛtaṃ vā hiṅgusaṃyutam//
Su.6.42.122 bījapūrakasāraṃ vā payasā saha sādhitam/
Su.6.42.123 bhojayeccāpi payasā jāṅgalena rasena vā/
Su.6.42.124 tadā+asya bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ sopastambhaṃ na pacyate/
Su.6.42.125 naivāsane na śayane †tiṣṭhan vā labhate sukham/
Su.6.42.127 nāgaraṃ dīpyakaṃ cavyaṃ hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ viḍam/
Su.6.42.128 bṛhatyāḥ kaṇṭakāryāśca kvāthaṃ śūlaharaṃ pibet/
Su.6.42.129 kuṭajasya ca bījāni sadyaḥśūlaharāṇi tu/
Su.6.42.136 vāyuḥ prakupito yasya rūkṣāhārasya dehinaḥ/
malaṃ ruṇaddhi koṣṭhasthaṃ mandīkṛtya tu pāvakam//
Su.6.42.137 śūlaṃ saṃjanayaṃstīvraṃ srotāṃsyāvṛtya tasya hi/
dakṣiṇaṃ yadi vā vāmaṃ kukṣimādāya jāyate//
Su.6.42.138 sarvatra vardhate kṣipraṃ bhramannatha† saghoṣavān/
pipāsā vardhate tīvrā bhramo mūrcchā ca jāyate//
Su.6.42.140 kṣipraṃ doṣaharaṃ kāryaṃ bhiṣajā sādhu jānatā/
Su.6.42.142 atimātraṃ yadā bhuktaṃ pāvake mṛdutāṃ gate/
Su.6.42.143 avipākagataṃ hyannaṃ śūlaṃ tīvraṃ karotyati/
Su.6.42.145 vamanaṃ laṅghanaṃ svedaḥ pācanaṃ phalavartayaḥ/
kṣārāścūrṇāni† guṭikāḥ śasyante śūlanāśanāḥ// gulmāvasthāḥ kriyāḥ kāryā yathāvat sarvaśūlinām//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre gulmapratiṣedho nāma (caturtho+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) dvicatvāriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //42//

div.head: tricatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.43.1 athāto hṛdrogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.43.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.43.4 dūṣayitvā rasaṃ doṣā viguṇā hṛdayaṃ gatāḥ/
kurvanti hṛdaye bādhāṃ hṛdrogaṃ taṃ pracakṣate//
Su.6.43.5 caturvidhaḥ sa doṣaiḥ syāt kṛmibhiśca† pṛthak pṛthak/
nirmathyate dīryate ca sphoṭyate pāṭyate+api ca//
dhūmāyanaṃ ca mūrcchā ca svedaḥ śoṣo mukhasya ca//
Su.6.43.9 utkleśaḥ ṣṭhīvanaṃ todaḥ śūlo hṛllāsakastamaḥ/
kṛmije kṛmijātīnāṃ ślaiṣmikāṇāṃ ca ye matāḥ//
Su.6.43.18 cūrṇaṃ tu pāyayetoktaṃ vātaje bhojayecca† tam/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre hṛdrogapratiṣedho nāma (pañcamo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) tricatvāriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //43//

div.head: catuścatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.44.1 athātaḥ pāṇḍurogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.44.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvandariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.44.3 vyavāyamamlaṃ lavaṇāni madyaṃ mṛdaṃ divāsvapnamatīva tīkṣṇam/
niṣevamāṇasya vidūṣya raktaṃ kurvanti doṣāstvaci pāṇḍubhāvam//
sarveṣu caiteṣviha pāṇḍubhāvo yato+adhiko+ataḥ khalu pāṇḍurogaḥ//
Su.6.44.10 sarvātmake sarvamidaṃ vyavasyed vakṣyāmi liṅgānyatha kāmalāyāḥ/
yo hyāmayānte sahasā+annamamlamadyādapathyāni ca tasya pittam//
Su.6.44.11 karoti pāṇḍuṃ vadanaṃ viśeṣāt †pūrveritau tandribalakṣayau ca/
bhedastu tasyāḥ khalu kumbhasāhvaḥ śopho mahāṃstatra ca parvabhedaḥ//
śophastathā kaṇṭhagato+abalatvaṃ mūrcchā klamo hṛdyavapīḍanaṃ ca//
Su.6.44.14 sādhyaṃ tu pāṇḍvāmayinaṃ samīkṣya snigdhaṃ ghṛtenordhvamadhaśca śuddham/
Su.6.44.15 pibedghṛtaṃ vā rajanīvipakvaṃ yantraiphalaṃ tailvakameva vā+api/
Su.6.44.16 mūtre nikumbhārdhapalaṃ vipācya pibedabhīkṣṇaṃ kuḍavārdhamātram/
Su.6.44.18 ahrecca doṣān bahuśo+alpamātrān śvayeddhi doṣeṣvatinirhṛteṣu/
dhātrīphalānāṃ rasamikṣujaṃ ca manthaṃ pibet kṣaudrayutaṃ hitāśī//
Su.6.44.19 ubhe bṛhatyau rajanīṃ śukākhyāṃ kākādanīṃ cāpi sakākamācīm/
Su.6.44.20 tat pāṇḍutāṃ hantyupayujyamānaṃ kṣīeṇa vā māgadhikā yathāgni/
hitaṃ ca yaṣṭīmadhujaṃ† kaṣāyaṃ cūrṇaṃ samaṃ vā madhunā+avalihyāt//
Su.6.44.22 ājaṃ śakṛtsyāt† kuḍavapramāṇaṃ viḍaṃ haridrā lavaṇottamaṃ ca/
Su.6.44.24 bibhītakāyomalanāgarāṇāṃ cūrṇaṃ tilānāṃ ca guḍaśca mukhyaḥ/
Su.6.44.25 sauvarcalaṃ hiṅgu kirātatiktaṃ kalāyamātrāṇi sukhāmbunā vā/
mūrvāharidrāmalakaṃ ca lihyāt sthitaṃ gavāṃ saptadināni mūtre//
Su.6.44.26 mūlaṃ balācitrakayoḥ pibedvā pāṇḍvāmayārto+akṣasamaṃ hitāśī/
sukhāmbunā vā lavaṇena tulyaṃ śigroḥ phalaṃ kṣīrabhujopayojyam//
Su.6.44.27 nyagrodhavargasya pibet kaṣāyaṃ śītaṃ sitākṣaudrayutaṃ hitāśī/
śālādikaṃ cāpyatha sāracūrṇaṃ dhātrīphalaṃ vā madhunā+avalihyāt//
cūrṇāni kṛtvā guḍaśarkare ca tathaiva sarpirmadhunī śume ca//
jātaṃ ca lehyaṃ matimān viditvā nidhāpayenmokṣakaje samudge//
Su.6.44.30 hantyeṣa lehaḥ khalu pāṇḍurogaṃ saśothamugrāmapi kāmalāṃ ca/
saśarkarā kāmalināṃ tribhaṇḍī hitā gavākṣī saguḍā ca śuṇṭhī//
Su.6.44.31 kāleyake cāpi ghṛtaṃ vipakvaṃ hitaṃ ca tat syādrajanīvimiśram/
dhātuṃ nadījaṃ jatu śailajaṃ vā kumbhāhvaye †mūtrayutaṃ pibedvā//
Su.6.44.32 mūtre sthitaṃ saindhavasaṃprayuktaṃ māsaṃ pibedvā+api hi lohakiṭṭam/
Su.6.44.33 vicūrṇya līḍhaṃ madhunā+acireṇa kumbhāhvayaṃ pāṇḍugadaṃ nihanyāt/
sindhūdbhavaṃ vā+agnisamaṃ ca kṛtvā kṣiptvā ca mūtre sakṛdeva taptam//
Su.6.44.34 lauhaṃ ca kiṭṭaṃ bahuśaśca taptvā nirvāpya mūtre bahuśastathaiva/
Su.6.44.35 yathā na dahyeta tathā viśuṣkaṃ cūrṇīkṛtaṃ peyamudaśvitā tat/
takraudanāśī vijayeta rogaṃ pāṇḍuṃ tathā dīpayate+analaṃ ca//
Su.6.44.36 drākṣāguḍūcyāmalakīrasaiśca siddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ lāgharake(lāghavake) hitaṃ ca/
Su.6.44.37 snigdhān rasānāmalakairupetān kolānvitān vā+api hi jāṅgalānām/
seveta śophābhihitāṃśca yogān pāṇḍvāmayī śāliyavāṃśca nityam//
Su.6.44.39 anteṣu śūnaṃ parihīnamadhyaṃ mlānaṃ tathā+anteṣu ca madhyaśūnam/
gude ca śephasyatha muṣkaśūnaṃ† pratāmyamānaṃ ca visaṃjñakalpam//
Su.6.44.40 vivarjayet pāṇḍukinaṃ yaśo+arthī tathā+atisārajvarapīḍitaṃ ca//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre pāṇḍurogapratiṣedho nāma (ṣaṣṭho+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) catuścatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //44//

div.head: pañcacatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.45.1 athāto raktapittapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.45.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.45.4 nityamabhyasato duṣṭo rasaḥ pittaṃ prakopayet/
Su.6.45.5 tataḥ pravartate raktamūrdhvaṃ cādho dvidhā+api vā/
Su.6.45.9 daurbalyaśvāsakāsajvaravamathumadāstandritādāhamūrcchā bhukte cānne vidāhastvadhṛtirapi sadā hṛdyatulyā ca pīḍā/
tṛṣṇā kaṇṭhasya bhedaḥ śirasi ca †davanaṃ pūtiniṣṭhīvanaṃ ca dveṣo bhakte+avipāko viratirapi rate raktapittopasargāḥ//
Su.6.45.10 māṃsaprakṣālanābhaṃ kvathitamiva ca yat kardamāmbhonibhaṃ vā medaḥpūyāsrakalpaṃ† yakṛdiva yadi vā pakvajambūphalābham/
yat kṛṣṇaṃ yacca nīlaṃ bhṛśamatikuṇapaṃ yatra coktā vikārāstadvarjyaṃ raktapittaṃ surapatidhanuṣā yacca tulyaṃ vibhāti//
Su.6.45.14 laṅghitasya tataḥ peyāṃ vidadhyāt svalpataṇḍulām/
tarpaṇaṃ pācanaṃ lehān sarpīṣi vividhāni ca//
Su.6.45.16 payāṃsi śītāni rasāśca jāṅgalāḥ satīnayūṣāśca saśāliṣaṣṭikāḥ/
Su.6.45.17 hitaṃ ca śākaṃ ghṛtasaṃskṛtaṃ sadā tathaiva dhātrīphaladāḍimānvitam/
himāḥ pradehā madhurā gaṇāśca ye ghṛtāni pathyāni ca raktapittinām//
Su.6.45.20 lihyācca dūrvāvaṭajāṃśca pallavān madhudvitīyān sitakarṇikasya† ca/
hitaṃ ca kharjūraphalaṃ samākṣikaṃ phalāni cānyānyapi tadguṇānyatha//
Su.6.45.22 yojayitvā kṣipedrātrāvākāśe sotpalaṃ tu tat/
Su.6.45.25 candnaṃ madhukaṃ rodhramevameva samaṃ pibet/
Su.6.45.29 palāśavṛkṣasvarase vipakvaṃ sarpiḥ pibet kṣaudrayutaṃ suśītam/
vanaspatīnāṃ svarasaiḥ kṛtaṃ vā saśarkaraṃ kṣīraghṛtaṃ pibedvā//
Su.6.45.30 drākṣāmuśīrāṇyatha padmakaṃ sitā pṛthakpalāṃśānyudake samāvapet/
sthitaṃ niśāṃ tadrudhirāmayaṃ jayet pītaṃ payo vā+ambusamaṃ hitāśinaḥ//
Su.6.45.31 turaṅgavarcaḥsvarasaṃ samākṣikaṃ pibet sitākṣaudrayutaṃ vṛṣasya vā/
drākṣāṃ sitāṃ tiktakarohiṇīṃ ca himāmbunā vā madhukena yuktām//
Su.6.45.33 pathyāmahiṃsrāṃ rajanīṃ ghṛtaṃ ca lihyāttathā śoṇitapittarogī/
Su.6.45.34 pītvā sitākṣaudrayutāni jahyāt pittasṛjo vegamudīrṇamāśu/
Su.6.45.35 puṣpāṇi śigrośca vicūrṇya leho madhvanvitaḥ śoṇitapittaroge/
Su.6.45.36 jambvarjunāmrakvathitaṃ ca toyaṃ ghnanti trayaḥ pittamasṛk ca yogāḥ/
mūlāni puṣpāṇi ca mātuluṅgyāḥ piṣṭvā pibettaṇḍuladhāvanena//
Su.6.45.37 ghrāṇapravṛtte jalamāśu deyaṃ saśarkaraṃ nāsikayā payo vā/
drākṣārasaṃ kṣīraghṛtaṃ pibedvā saśarkaraṃ cekṣurasaṃ himaṃ vā//
Su.6.45.38 śītopacāraṃ madhuraṃ ca kuryādviśeṣataḥ śoṇitapittaroge/
Su.6.45.39 kṣīreṇa cāsthāpanamagryamuktaṃ hitaṃ ghṛtaṃ cāpyanuvāsanārtham/
Su.6.45.42 virekayoge tvati caiva śasyate vāmyaśca rakte vijite balānvitaḥ//
Su.6.45.43 evaṃvidhā uttarabāstayaśca mūtrāśayasthe rudhire vidheyāḥ/
pravṛttarakteṣu ca pāyujeṣu kuryādvidhānaṃ khalu raktapaittam//
Su.6.45.45 trayāṇāmapi doṣāṇāṃ śoṇite+api ca sarvaśaḥ/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre raktapittapratiṣedho nāma (saptamo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) pañcacatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //45//

div.head: ṣaṭcatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.46.1 athāto mūrcchāpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.46.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.46.5 hṛtpīḍā jṛmbhaṇaṃ glāniḥ saṃjñānāśo balasya ca/
moho mūrccheti tāṃ prāhuḥ ṣaḍvidhā sā prakīrtitā//
Su.6.46.8 vātādibhiḥ śoṇitena madyena ca viṣeṇa ca/
Su.6.46.10 tasmādraktasya gandhena mūrcchanti bhuvi mānavāḥ/
gātrāṇi vikṣipan bhūmau jarāṃ yāvanna yāti tat//
Su.6.46.14 sekāvagāhau maṇayaḥ sahārāḥ śītāḥ pradehā vyajanānilāśca/
śītāni pānāni ca gandhavanti sarvāsu mūrcchāsvanivāritāni//
kharjūrakāśmaryarasaiḥ śṛtāni pānāni sarpīṃṣi ca jīvanāni//
Su.6.46.16 siddhāni varge madhure payāṃsi sadāḍimā jāṅgalajā rasāśca/
tathā yavā lohitaśālayaśca mūrcchāsu pathyāśca sadā satīnāḥ//
Su.6.46.17 bhujaṅgapuṣpaṃ maricānyuśīraṃ kolasya madhyaṃ ca pibet samāni/
śītena toyena† bisaṃ mṛṇālaṃ kṣaudreṇa kṛṣṇāṃ sitayā ca pathyām//
Su.6.46.18 kuryācca nāsāvadanāvarodhaṃ kṣīraṃ pibedvā+apyatha mānuṣīṇām/
mūrcchāṃ prasaktāṃ tu śirovirekairjayedabhīkṣṇaṃ vamanaiśca tīkṣṇaiḥ//
Su.6.46.19 †harītakīkvāthaśṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ vā dhātrīphalānāṃ svarasaiḥ kṛtaṃ vā/
Su.6.46.20 pibet kaṣāyāṇi ca gandhavanti pittajvaraṃ yāni śamaṃ nayanti/
Su.6.46.21 saṃnyastasaṃjño bhṛśaduścikitsyo jñeyastadā buddhimatā manuṣyāḥ/
ābhiḥ kriyābhiśca na labdhasaṃjñaḥ sānāhalālāśvasanaśca varjyaḥ//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre mūrcchāpratiṣedho nāma (aṣṭamo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) ṣaṭcatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //46//

div.head: saptacatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.47.1 athātaḥ pānātyayapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.47.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.47.3 madyamuṣṇaṃ tathā tīkṣṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ viśadameva ca/
rūkṣamāśukaraṃ caiva vyavāyi ca vikāśi ca//
Su.6.47.6 tadamlaṃ rasataḥ proktaṃ laghu rocanadīpanam/
vidhivat sevyamāne tu madye sannihitā guṇāḥ//
Su.6.47.10 madena karaṇānāṃ tu bhāvānyatve kṛte sati/
Su.6.47.11 tryavasthaśca mado jñeyaḥ pūrvo madhyo+atha paścimaḥ/
Su.6.47.14 nirbhaktamekāntata eva madyaṃ niṣevyamāṇaṃ manujena nityam/
Su.6.47.15 kruddhena bhītena pipāsitena śokābhitaptena bubhukṣitena/
uṣṇābhitaptena ca sevyamānaṃ karoti madyaṃ vividhān vikārān//
Su.6.47.19 śleṣmātmake vamathuśītakaphaprasekāḥ sarvātmake bhavati sarvavikārasaṃpat/
Su.6.47.20 liṅgaṃ parasya tu madasya vadanti tajjñāstṛṣṇāṃ rujāṃ śirasi sandhiṣu cāpi bhedam/
Su.6.47.21 jñeyāni tatra bhiṣajā suviniścitāni pittaprakopajanitāni ca kāraṇāni/
Su.6.47.22 dveṣaḥ surānnavikṛteṣu ca teṣu teṣu taṃ pānavibhramamuśantyakhilena dhīrāḥ/
Su.6.47.23 jihvauṣṭhadantamasitaṃ tvathavā+api nīlaṃ pīte ca yasya nayane rudhiraprame ca/
hikkājvarau vamathuvepathupārśvaśūlāḥ kāsabhramāvapi ca pānahataṃ bhajante//
Su.6.47.24 teṣāṃ nivāraṇamidaṃ hi mayocyamānaṃ vyaktābhidhānamakhilena vidhiṃ nibodha/
Su.6.47.25 pṛthvīkadīpyakamahauṣadhahiṅgubhirvā sauvarcalena ca yutaṃ vitaret sukhāya/
Su.6.47.26 seveta vā phalarasopahitān rasādīnānūpavargapiśitānyapi gandhavanti/
Su.6.47.27 pītvā ca madyamapi cekṣurasapragāḍhaṃ niḥśeṣataḥ kṣaṇamavasthitamullikhecca/
lāvaiṇatittirirasāṃśca pibedanamlān maudgān sukhāya saghṛtān sasitāṃśca yūṣān//
Su.6.47.28 pānātyaye kaphakṛte kaphamullikhecca madyena bimbividulodakasaṃyutena/
seveta tiktakaṭukāṃśca rasānudārān yūṣāṃśca tiktakaṭukopahitān hitāya//
Su.6.47.29 pathyaṃ yavānnavikṛtāni ca jāṅgalāni śleṣmaghnamanyadapi yacca niratyayaṃ syāt/
kuryācca sarvamatha sarvabhave vidhānaṃ ddvandvodbhave dvayamavekṣya yathāpradhānam//
Su.6.47.30 sāmānyamanyadapi yacca samagramagryaṃ vakṣyāmi yacca manaso madakṛt sukhaṃ ca/
Su.6.47.32 piṣṭaiḥ sapadmakayutairapi sārivādyaiḥ sekaṃ jalaiśca vitaredamalaiḥ suśītaiḥ/
Su.6.47.33 drākṣāyutaṃ hṛtamalaṃ madirāmayārtaistatpānakaṃ śuci sugandhi narairniṣevyam/
piṣṭvā pibecca madhukaṃ kaṭurohiṇīṃ ca drākṣāṃ ca mūlamasakṛt trapuṣībhavaṃ yat//
Su.6.47.34 †kārpāsinīmatha ca nāgabalāṃ ca tulyāṃ pītvā sukhī bhavati sādhu suvarcalāṃ ca/
Su.6.47.35 tadbījapūrakarasāyutamāśu pītaṃ śāntiṃ parāṃ paramade tvacirāt karoti/
Su.6.47.36 sauvarcalāyutamudārarasaṃ phalāmlaṃ bhārgīśṛtena ca jalena hito+avasekaḥ//
vipācya tasyāñjalinā vameddhi madyaṃ pibeccāhni gate tvajīrṇe//
Su.6.47.39 hṛdyaiḥ khaḍairapi ca bhojanamatra śastaṃ drākṣākapitthaphaladāḍimapānakaṃ yat/
Su.6.47.40 kharjūravetrakakarīraparūṣakeṣu† drākṣātrivṛtsu ca kṛtaṃ sasitaṃ himaṃ vā/
Su.6.47.43 pañcendriyārthaviṣayā mṛdupānayogā hṛdyāḥ sukhāśca manasaḥ satataṃ niṣevyāḥ†/
drākṣāṃ ca kṛṣṇāmatha keśaraṃ ca kṣīre samāloḍya pibet †sukhepsuḥ//
Su.6.47.47 bhavecca madyena tu yena pātitaḥ prakāmapītena surāsavādinā/
Su.6.47.48 yathā narendropahatasya kasyacidbhavet prasādastata eva nānyataḥ/
dhruvaṃ tathā madyahatasya dehino bhavet prasādastata eva nānyataḥ//
Su.6.47.53 pakvamabhyañjane śreṣṭhaṃ seke kvāthaśca śītalaḥ/
Su.6.47.54 pānakāni suśītāni hṛdyāni surabhīṇi ca/
Su.6.47.55 śītaṃ vidhānamata ūrdhvamahaṃ pravakṣye dāhapraśāntikaramṛddhimatāṃ narāṇām/
bhinnotpalojjvalahime śayane śayīta patreṣu vā sajalabinduṣu padminīnām//
tatrainamamburuhapatrasamaiḥ spṛśantyaḥ śītaiḥ karoruvadanaiḥ kaṭhinaiḥ stanaiśca//
Su.6.47.60 toyāvagāhakuśalā madhurasvabhāvāḥ saṃharṣayeyurabalāḥ sukalaiḥ† pralāpaiḥ/
Su.6.47.62 tasmin gṛhe kamalareṇvaruṇe śayīta yatnāhṛtānilavikampitapuṣpadāmni/
Su.6.47.63 udbhinnanīlanalināmburuhākarāṇāṃ candrodayasya ca kathāḥ śṛṇuyānmanojñāḥ/
Su.6.47.64 tā enamārdravasanāḥ saha saṃviśeyuḥ śliṣṭvā+avalāḥ śithilamekhalahārayaṣṭyaḥ//
Su.6.47.65 harṣayeyurnaraṃ nāryaḥ svaguṇai rahasi sthitāḥ/
Su.6.47.69 apraśāmyati dāhe ca rasaistṛptasya jāṅgalaiḥ/
Su.6.47.70 pittajvarasamaḥ pittāt sa cāpyasya vidhirhitaḥ/
sarva eva ca varjyāḥ syuḥ śītagātreṣu dehiṣu//
madyāni hṛdyānyatha gandhavanti pītāni sadyaḥ śamayanti tṛṣṇām//
piben surāṃ naiva labheta rogān †manonuvighnaṃ ca madaṃ na yāti//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre madātyayapratiṣedho nāma (navamo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) saptacatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //47//

div.head: aṣṭacatvāriṃśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.48.1 athātastṛṣṇāpratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.48.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.48.3 satataṃ yaḥ pibedvāri na tṛptimadhigacchati/
punaḥ kāṅkṣati toyaṃ ca taṃ tṛṣṇārditamādiśet//
dhātukṣayāllaṅghanasūryatāpāt pittaṃ ca vātaśca bhṛśaṃ pravṛddhau//
Su.6.48.5 srotāṃsi saṃdūṣayataḥ sametau yānyambuvāhīni śarīriṇāṃ hi/
Su.6.48.6 tisraḥ smṛtāstāḥ kṣatajā caturthī kṣayāttathā+anyā++āmasamudbhavā ca/
syāt saptamī bhaktanimittajā tu nibodha† liṅgānyanupūrvaśastu//
srotonirodho virasaṃ ca vaktraṃ śītabhiradbhiśca vivṛddhimeti//
śītābhikāṅkṣā mukhatiktatā ca pittātmikāyāṃ paridhūpanaṃ ca//
Su.6.48.10 kaphāvṛtābhyāmanilānalābhyāṃ kapho+api śuṣkaḥ prakaroti tṛṣṇām†/
nidrā gurutvaṃ madhurāsyatā ca tayā+arditaḥ† śuṣyati cātimātram//
kaphātmikāyāṃ gurugātratā ca śākhāsu śophastvavipāka eva/
etāni rūpāṇi bhavanti tasyāṃ tayā+arditaḥ kāṅkṣati nāti cāmbhaḥ//
Su.6.48.12 kṣatasya rukśoṇitanirgamābhyāṃ tṛṣṇā caturthī kṣatajā †matā tu/
tayā+abhibhūtasya niśādināni gacchanti duḥkhaṃ pibato+api toyam//
Su.6.48.13 †rasakṣayādyā kṣayajā matā sā tayā+arditaḥ śuṣyati dahyate ca/
atyarthamākāṅkṣati cāpi toyaṃ tāṃ sannipātāditi kecidāhuḥ//
Su.6.48.14 rasakṣayoktāni ca lakṣaṇāni tasyāmaśeṣeṇa bhiṣagvyavasyet/
Su.6.48.15 snigdhaṃ tathā+amlaṃ lavaṇaṃ ca bhuktaṃ †gurvannamevātitṛṣāṃ karoti/
Su.6.48.16 tṛṣṇābhivṛddhāvudare ca pūrṇe taṃ vāmayenmāgadhikodakena/
Su.6.48.17 tisraḥ prayogairiha sannivāryāḥ śītaiśca samyagrasavīryajātaiḥ/
jalaṃ sukhoṣṇaṃ śamayettu tṛṣṇāṃ saśarkaraṃ kṣaudrayutaṃ himaṃ vā//
Su.6.48.19 pañcāṅgikāḥ pañcagaṇā ya uktāsteṣvambu† siddhaṃ prathame gaṇe vā/
pibet sukhoṣṇaṃ manujo†+acireṇa tṛṣo vimucyeta hi vātajāyāḥ//
Su.6.48.20 pittaghnavargaistu kṛtaḥ kaṣāyaḥ saśarkaraḥ kṣaudrayutaḥ suśītaḥ/
pītastṛṣāṃ pittakṛtāṃ nihanti kṣīraṃ śṛtaṃ vā+apyatha jīvanīyaiḥ//
Su.6.48.22 sarvāsu tṛṣṇāsvathavā+api paittaṃ kuryādvidhiṃ tena† hi tā na santi/
Su.6.48.23 vargasya siddhasya ca sārivādeḥ pātavyamambhaḥ śiśiraṃ tṛṣārtaiḥ/
Su.6.48.24 lājotpalośīrakucandanāni dattvā pravāte niśi vāsayettu/
Su.6.48.25 drākṣāpragāḍhaṃ ca hitāya vaidyastṛṣṇārditebhyo vitarennarebhyaḥ/
Su.6.48.26 kuryāt kaṣāyaṃ ca yatheritena† madhūkapuṣpādiṣu cāpareṣu/
rājādanakṣīrikapītaneṣu ṣaṭ pānakānyatra hitāni ca syuḥ//
Su.6.48.28 kṣayotthitāṃ kṣīraghṛtaṃ nihanyānmāṃsodakaṃ vā madhukodakaṃ vā/
gurvannajātāṃ vamanairjayecca kṣayādṛte sarvakṛtāṃ ca tṛṣṇām//
Su.6.48.30 śramodbhavāṃ māṃsaraso nihanti guḍodakaṃ vā+apyathavā+api manthaḥ/
Su.6.48.31 yā snehapītasya bhavecca tṛṣṇā tatroṣṇamambhaḥ prapibenmanuṣyaḥ/
madyodbhavāmardhajalaṃ nihanti madyaṃ tṛṣāṃ yā+api ca madyapasya//
Su.6.48.32 †tṛṣṇodbhavāṃ hanti jalaṃ suśītaṃ saśarkaraṃ sekṣurasaṃ tathā+ambhaḥ/
svaiḥ svaiḥ kaṣāyairvamanāni tāsāṃ tathā jvaroktāni ca pācanāni//
Su.6.48.33 lepāvagāhau pariṣecanāni kuryāttathā śītagṛhāṇi cāpi/
saṃśodhanaṃ kṣīrarasau ghṛtāni sarvāsu lehānmadhurān himāṃśca//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre (daśamo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) aṣṭacatvāriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ //48//

div.head: ekonapañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.49.1 athātaśchardipratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.49.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: pūrvarūpaṃ mataṃ chardyā yathāsvaṃ ca vibhāvayet//
śrāntaḥ saghoṣaṃ bahuśaḥ kaṣāyaṃ jīrṇe+adhikaṃ sā+anilajā vamistu//
Su.6.49.10 yo+amlaṃ bhṛśaṃ vā kaṭutiktavaktraḥ pītaṃ saraktaṃ haritaṃ vamedvā/
Su.6.49.11 yo hṛṣṭaromā madhuraṃ prabhūtaṃ śuklaṃ himaṃ sāndrakaphānuviddham/
Su.6.49.12 sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bhavanti yasyāṃ sā sarvadoṣaprabhavā matā tu/
bībhatsajā dauhṛdajā++āmajā ca †sātmyaprakopāt kṛmijā ca †yā hi/
sā pañcamī †tāṃ ca vibhāvayettu doṣocchrayeṇaiva yathoktamādau//
Su.6.49.18 yathāsvaṃ ca kaṣāyāṇi jvaraghnāni prayojayet/
Su.6.49.20 pibedvā vyaktasindhūtthaṃ phalāmlaṃ vaiṣkiraṃ rasam/
Su.6.49.24 kṛtaṃ guḍūcyā vidhivat kaṣāyaṃ himasaṃjñitam/
Su.6.49.28 samākṣikā madhurasā pītā vā taṇḍulāmbunā/
Su.6.49.33 dhātrīrase candanaṃ vā ghṛṣṭaṃ mudgadalāmbunā/
Su.6.49.34 sakṣaudrāṃ śālilājānāṃ yavagūṃ vā pibennaraḥ/
Su.6.49.35 jāṅgalāni ca māṃsāni śubhāni† pānakāni ca/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre chardipratiṣedho nāma (ekādaśo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) ekonapañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //49//

div.head: pañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.50.1 athāto hikkāpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.50.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: sa ghoṣavānāśu hinastyasūn yatastatastu hikketi bhiṣagbhirucyate//
Su.6.50.7 annajāṃ yamalāṃ kṣudrāṃ gambhīrāṃ mahatīṃ tathā/
vāyuḥ kaphenānugataḥ pañca hikkāḥ karoti hi//
Su.6.50.10 hikkayatyūrdhvago bhūtvā tāṃ vidyādannajāṃ bhiṣak/
Su.6.50.11 kampayantī śirogrīvaṃ yamalāṃ tāṃ vinirdiśet/
Su.6.50.12 kṣudrikā nāma sā hikkā jatrumūlāt pradhāvitā/
Su.6.50.15 āyamyate hikkato+aṅgāni yasya dṛṣṭiścordhvaṃ tāmyate yasya gāḍham/
kṣīṇo+annadviṭ †kāsate yaśca hikkī tau dvāvantyau varjayeddhikkamānau//
yaṣṭyāhvaṃ vā mākṣikeṇāvapīḍe pippalyo vā śarkarācūrṇayuktāḥ//
Su.6.50.17 sarpiḥ koṣṇaṃ kṣīramikṣo raso vā nātikṣīṇe chardanaṃ †śāntihetoḥ/
nārīpayaḥpiṣṭamaśuklacandanaṃ ghṛtaṃ sukhoṣṇaṃ ca sasaindhavaṃ tathā//
Su.6.50.18 cūrṇīkṛtaṃ saindhavamambhasā+athavā nihanti hikkāṃ ca hitaṃ ca nasyataḥ/
yuñjyāddhūmaṃ śālaniryāsajātaṃ naipālaṃ vā goviṣāṇodbhavaṃ vā//
Su.6.50.19 sarpiḥsnigdhaiścarmabālaiḥ kṛtaṃ vā hikkāsthāne svedanaṃ cāpi kāryam/
kṣaudropetaṃ gairikaṃ kāñcanāhvaṃ lihyādbhasma grāmyasattvāsthijaṃ vā//
