Su.6.50.21 svarjikṣāraṃ bījapūrādrasena kṣaudropetaṃ hanti līḍhvā++āśu hikkām/
sarpiḥsnigdhā ghnanti hikkāṃ yavāgvaḥ koṣṇagrāsāḥ pāyaso vā sukhoṣṇaḥ//
Su.6.50.22 śuṇṭhītoye sādhitaṃ kṣīramājaṃ tadvat pītaṃ śarkarāsaṃyutaṃ vā/
ātṛptervā sevyamānaṃ nihantyād ghrātaṃ hikkāmāśu mūtraṃ tvajāvyoḥ//
Su.6.50.24 pibet palaṃ vā lavaṇottamasya dvābhyāṃ palābhyāṃ haviṣaḥ samagram/
Su.6.50.26 kṛṣṇāṃ sitāṃ cāmalakaṃ ca līḍhaṃ saśṛṅgaveraṃ madhunā+athavā+api/
Su.6.50.27 pāṭalāyāḥ phalaṃ puṣpaṃ gairikaṃ kaṭurohiṇī/
Su.6.50.28 catvāra ete yogāḥ syuḥ pratipādapradarśitāḥ/
Su.6.50.30 virecanaṃ pathyatamaṃ sasaindhavaṃ ghṛtaṃ sukhoṣṇaṃ ca sitopalāyutam/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre hikkāpratiṣedho nāma (dvādaśo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) pañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //50//

div.head: ekapañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.51.1 athātaḥ śvāsapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.51.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: taireva kāraṇaiḥ śvāso ghoro bhavati dehinām//
Su.6.51.4 vihāya prakṛtiṃ vāyuḥ prāṇo+atha kaphasaṃyutaḥ/
bhidyate sa mahāvyādhiḥ śvāsa eko viśeṣataḥ//
Su.6.51.6 prāgrūpaṃ tasya hṛtpīḍā bhaktadveṣo+aratiḥ parā/
ānāhaḥ pārśvayoḥ śūlaṃ vairasyaṃ vadanasya ca//
niṣaṇṇasyaiti śāntiṃ ca sa kṣudra iti saṃjñitaḥ//
Su.6.51.9 ghoṣeṇa mahatā++āviṣṭaḥ sakāsaḥ sakapho naraḥ/
Su.6.51.10 sa śāmyati kaphe hīne svapataśca vidhardhate/
Su.6.51.11 ādhmāto dahyamānena bastinā sarujaṃ naraḥ/
saṃrabdhanetrastvāyamya yaḥ śvasyāt sa mahān smṛtaḥ/
Su.6.51.14 kṣudraḥ sādhyatamasteṣāṃ tamakaḥ kṛcchra ucyate/
trayaḥ śvāsā na sidhyanti tamako durbalasya ca//
Su.6.51.15 snehabastiṃ vinā† kecidūrdhvaṃ cādhaśca śodhanam/
Su.6.51.16 śvāse kāse ca hikkāyāṃ hṛdroge cāpi pūjitam/
Su.6.51.20 arśāṃsyarocakaṃ gulmaṃ śakṛdbhedaṃ kṣayaṃ tathā/
Su.6.51.23 śvāsaṃ kāsaṃ tathā hikkāṃ sarpiretanniyacchati/
suvahā kālikā bhargī śukākhyā naiculaṃ phalam//
vāsāghṛtaṃ ṣaṭpalaṃ vā ghṛtaṃ cātra hitaṃ bhavet//
Su.6.51.30 tailaṃ daśaguṇe siddhaṃ bhṛṅgarājarase śubhe/
Su.6.51.32 hanyuḥ śvāsaṃ ca kāsaṃ ca saṃskṛtāni payāṃsi ca/
timirasya† ca bījāni karkaṭākhyā ca cūrṇitā//
Su.6.51.34 bhārgītvak śṛṅgaveraṃ ca śarkarā śallakāṅgajam/
Su.6.51.35 pañca ślokārdhikāstvete lehā ye samyagīritāḥ/
Su.6.51.41 sarpirmadhubhyāṃ vilihan hanti śvāsān sudāruṇān/
haridrāṃ maricaṃ drākṣāṃ guḍaṃ rāsnāṃ kaṇāṃ śaṭīm//
Su.6.51.43 lihyācchvāsseṣu kāseṣu vājināṃ vā śakṛdrasam/
Su.6.51.44 śvāsakāsāpahāste+api kāsaghnā ye ca kīrtitāḥ/
Su.6.51.45 pippalīṃ maricaṃ caṇḍāṃ gośakṛdrasameva ca/
Su.6.51.47 surā sauvīrakaṃ hiṅgu mātuluṅgaraso madhu/
Su.6.51.49 khastho vilayanaṃ yāti mārutaśca praśāmyati/
Su.6.51.50 vātaśleṣmavibandhe vā bhiṣag dhūmaṃ prayojayet/
Su.6.51.53 ete sarve sasarpiṣkā dhūmāḥ kāryā vijānatā/
Su.6.51.54 durbale caiva rūkṣe ca tarpaṇaṃ hitamucyate/
Su.6.51.55 nidigdhikāṃ cāmalakapramāṇāṃ hiṅgvardhayuktāṃ madhunā suyuktām/
lihannaraḥ śvāsanipīḍito hi śvāsaṃ jayatyeva balāttryaheṇa//
Su.6.51.56 yathā+agniriddhaḥ †pavanānuviddho vajraṃ yathā vā surarājamuktam/
rogāstathaite khalu durnivārāḥ śvāsaśca kāsaśca vilambikā ca//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre hikkāśvāsapratiṣedho nāma (tryodaśo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) ekapañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //51//

div.head: dvipañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.52.1 athātaḥ kāsapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.52.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.52.3 uktā ye hetavo nṝṇāṃ rogayoḥ śvāsahikkayoḥ/
nireti vaktrāt sahasā sadoṣaḥ kāsaḥ sa vidvadbhirudāhṛtastu//
Su.6.52.6 sa vātapittaprabhavaḥ kaphācca kṣatāttathā+anyaḥ kṣayajo+aparaśca/
pittena pītāni vamet kaṭūni kāset sa pāṇḍuḥ paridahyamānaḥ//
Su.6.52.10 pralipyamānena(vilipyamānena) mukhena sīdan śirorujārtaḥ kaphapūrṇadehaḥ/
Su.6.52.11 vakṣo+atimātraṃ vihataṃ tu yasya vyāyāmabhārādhyayanābhighātaiḥ/
viśliṣṭavakṣāḥ sa naraḥ saraktaṃ ṣṭhīvatyabhīkṣṇaṃ kṣatajaṃ† tamūhuḥ//
Su.6.52.12 sa gātraśūlajvaradāhamohān prāṇakṣayaṃ copalabheta kāsī/
śuṣyan viniṣṭhīvati durbalastu prakṣīṇamāṃso rudhiraṃ sapūyam//
vṛddhatvamāsādya †bhavettu yo vai yāpyaṃ tamāhurbhiṣajastu kāsam//
uṣṇāmbunā hiṅguyutaṃ tu pītvā baddhāsyamapyāśu jahāti kāsam//
Su.6.52.16 pathyāṃ sitāmāmalakāni lājāṃ samāgadhīṃ cāpi vicūrṇya śuṇṭhīm/
sarpirmadhubhyāṃ vilihīta kāsī sasaindhavāṃ voṣṇajalena kṛṣṇām//
Su.6.52.17 khādedguḍaṃ nāgarapippalībhyāṃ drākṣāṃ ca sarpirmadhunā+avalihyāt/
drākṣāṃ sitāṃ māgadhikāṃ ca tulyāṃ saśṛṅgaveraṃ madhukaṃ tugāṃ ca//
Su.6.52.18 lihyādghṛtakṣaudrayutāṃ samāṃśāṃ sitopalāṃ vā maricāṃśayuktām/
Su.6.52.19 hareṇukāṃ māgadhikāṃ ca †tulyāṃ dadhnā pibet kāsagadābhibhūtaḥ/
ubhe haridre suradāruśuṇṭhīṃ gāyatrisāraṃ ca pibet samāṃśam//
Su.6.52.20 bastasya mūtreṇa sukhāmbunā vā dantīṃ dravantīṃ ca satilvakākhyām†/
bhṛṣṭāni sarpīṃṣyatha bādarāṇi khādet palāśāni sasaindhavāni//
Su.6.52.21 kolapramāṇaṃ prapibeddhi hiṅgu sauvīrakeṇāmlarasena vā+api/
kṣaudreṇa lihyānmaricāni vā+api bhārgīvacāhiṅgukṛtā ca vartiḥ//
Su.6.52.22 dhūme praśastā ghṛtasaṃprayuktā veṇutvagelālavaṇaiḥ kṛtā vā/
Su.6.52.23 vidhāya vartīśca payo+anupānaṃ dhūmaṃ pibedvātabalāsakāsī/
pibecca sīdhuṃ maricānvitaṃ vā tenāśu kāsaṃ jayati prasahya//
Su.6.52.25 utkārikāṃ sarpiṣi nāgarāḍhyāṃ paktvā samūlaistruṭikolapatraiḥ/
ebhirniṣeveta kṛtāṃ ca peyāṃ tanvīṃ suśītāṃ madhunā vimiśrām//
Su.6.52.26 yat plīhni sarpirvihitaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ tadvātakāsaṃ jayati prasahya/
vidārigandhādikṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ vā rasena vā vāsakajena pakvam//
Su.6.52.27 virecanaṃ snaihikamatra coktamāsthāpanaṃ cāpyanuvāsanaṃ ca/
dhūmaṃ pibet snaihikamapramattaḥ pibet sukhoṣṇaṃ ghṛtameva cātra//
Su.6.52.28 hitā yavāgvaśca raseṣu siddhāḥ payāṃsi lehāḥ saghṛtāstathaiva/
Su.6.52.29 uṣṇāśca lehāḥ kaṭukā nihanyuḥ kaphaṃ viśeṣeṇa viśoṣaṇaṃ ca/
kaṭutrikaṃ cāpi vadanti pathyaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṛmighnasvarase vipakvam//
Su.6.52.30 nirguṇḍipatrasvarase ca pakvaṃ sarpiḥ kaphotthaṃ vinihanti kāsam/
Su.6.52.33 ghṛtaṃ pacedikṣurasāmbudugdhaiḥ kākolivarge ca saśarkaraṃ tat/
prātaḥ pibet pittakṛte ca kāse ratiprasūte kṣataje ca kāse//
kṣaudreṇa kāse kṣataje kṣayotthe pibedghṛtaṃ cekṣurase vipakvam//
Su.6.52.36 cūrṇaṃ pibedāmalakasya vā+api kṣīreṇa pakvaṃ saghṛtaṃ hitāśī/
Su.6.52.37 kāseṣu peyastriṣu kāsavadbhiḥ kṣīreṇa sakṣaudraghṛtena vā+api/
guḍodakaṃ vā kvathitaṃ pibeddhi kṣaudreṇa śītaṃ maricopadaṃśam//
dattvā trivṛccūrṇapalāni cāṣṭāvaṣṭau ca tailasya pacedyathāvat//
Su.6.52.41 śāmyanti cāyaṃ ciramantaragnerhatasya puṃstvasya ca vṛddhihetuḥ/
strīṇāṃ ca vandhyāmayanāśanaḥ syāt kalyāṇako nāma guḍaḥ pratītaḥ//
Su.6.52.43 dvipālikān †nyasya yavāḍhakaṃ ca harītakīnāṃ ca śataṃ gurūṇām/
droṇe jalasyāḍhakasaṃyute ca kvāthe kṛte pūtacaturthabhāge//
Su.6.52.44 pacettulāṃ śuddhaguḍasya dattvā pṛthak ca tailāt kuḍavaṃ ghṛtācca/
cūrṇaṃ ca tāvanmagadhodbhavāyā deyaṃ ca tasminmadhu siddhaśīte//
Su.6.52.45 rasāyanāt karṣamato vilihyāddve cābhaye nityamathāśu hanyāt/
Su.6.52.47 kulīraśuktīcaṭakaiṇalāvānniṣkvāthya vargaṃ madhuraṃ ca kṛtsnam/
pacedghṛtaṃ tattu niṣevyamāṇaṃ hanyāt kṣatotthaṃ kṣayajaṃ ca kāsam// śatāvarīnāgabalāvipakvaṃ ghṛtaṃ vidheyaṃ ca hitāya kāsinām/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre kāsapratiṣedho nāma (caturdaśo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) dvipañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //52//

div.head: tripañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.53.1 athātaḥ svarabhedapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.53.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: srotaḥsu te svaravaheṣu gatāḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ hanyuḥ svaraṃ bhavati cāpi hi ṣaḍvidhaḥ saḥ//
Su.6.53.4 vātena kṛṣṇanayanānanamūtravarcā bhinnaṃ śanairvadati gadgadavat svaraṃ ca/
Su.6.53.5 kṛcchrāt kaphena satataṃ kapharuddhakaṇṭho mandaṃ śanairvadati cāpi divā viśeṣaḥ†/
Su.6.53.6 dhūpyeta vāk kṣayakṛte kṣayamāpnuyācca vāgeṣa cāpi(vāpi) hatavāk parivarjanīyaḥ/
Su.6.53.7 kṣīṇasya vṛddhasya kṛśasya cāpi cirotthito yaśca sahopajātaḥ/
medasvinaḥ sarvasamudbhavaśca svarāmayo yo na sa siddhimeti//
Su.6.53.9 yaḥ śvāsakāsavidhirādita eva coktastaṃ cāpyaśeṣamavatārayituṃ yateta/
vaiśeṣikaṃ ca vidhimūrdhvamato vadāmi taṃ vai svarāturahitaṃ nikhilaṃ nibodha//
Su.6.53.11 pītaṃ ghṛtaṃ hantyanilaṃ siddhamārtagale rase/
Su.6.53.13 kṣīrānupānaṃ pitte tu pibet sarpiratandritaḥ/
Su.6.53.15 pibet kaṭūni mūtreṇa kaphaje svarasaṃkṣaye/
lihyādvā madhutailābhyāṃ bhuktvā khādet kaṭūni vā//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre chardipratiṣedho nāma (pañcadaśo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) tripañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //53//

div.head: catuḥpañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.54.1 athātaḥ kṛmirogapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.54.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: dhamanyāṃ raktajānāṃ ca prasavaḥ prāyaśaḥ smṛtaḥ//
Su.6.54.7 viṃśateḥ kṛmijātīnāṃ trividhaḥ saṃbhavaḥ smṛtaḥ/
Su.6.54.9 śvetāḥ sūkṣmāstudantyete gudaṃ pratisaranti ca/
Su.6.54.16 te saraktāśca kṛṣṇāśca snigdhāśca pṛthavastathā/
jvaro vivarṇatā śūlaṃ hṛdrogaḥ sadanaṃ bhramaḥ//
Su.6.54.23 pratyāgate nirūhe tu naraṃ snātaṃ sukhāmbunā/
Su.6.54.24 snehenoktena cainaṃ tu yojayet snehabastinā/
Su.6.54.28 khādet pūpalikāḥ pakvā dhānyāmlaṃ ca pibedanu/
Su.6.54.32 pūtīkasvarasaṃ vā+api pibedvā madhunā saha/
Su.6.54.33 saptarātraṃ pibedghṛṣṭaṃ trapu vā dadhimastunā/
niṣkvāthena viḍaṅgānāṃ cūrṇaṃ pradhamanaṃ tu tat//
Su.6.54.39 pravyaktatikatakaṭukaṃ bhojanaṃ ca hitaṃ bhavet/
Su.6.54.40 kṣīrāṇi māṃsāni ghṛtāni caiva dadhīni śākāni ca parṇavanti/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre kṛmipratiṣedho nāma (ṣoḍaśo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) catuḥpañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //54//

div.head: pañcapañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.55.1 athāta udāvartapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.55.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.55.3 adhaścordhvaṃ ca bhāvānāṃ pravṛttānāṃ svabhāvataḥ/
na vegān dhārayet prājño vātādīnāṃ jijīviṣuḥ//
Su.6.55.7 ādhmānaśūlau hṛdayoparodhaṃ śirorujaṃ śvāsamatīva hikkām/
Su.6.55.8 kuryādapāno+abhihataḥ svamārge hanyāt purīṣaṃ mukhataḥ kṣipedvā/
āṭopaśūlau parikartanaṃ ca saṅgaḥ purīṣasya tathordhvavātaḥ//
Su.6.55.9 purīṣamāsyādapi vā nireti purīṣavege+abhihate narasya/
mūtrasya vege+abhihate narastu kṛcchreṇa mūtraṃ kurute+alpamalpam//
Su.6.55.12 ānandajaṃ śokasamudbhavaṃ vā netrodakaṃ prāptamamuñcato hi/
śirogurutvaṃ nayanāmayāśca bhavanti tīvrāḥ saha pīnasena//
Su.6.55.14 udgāravege+abhihate bhavanti ghorā vikārāḥ pavanaprasūtāḥ/
chardervighātena bhavecca kuṣṭhaṃ yenaiva doṣeṇa vidagdhamannam//
Su.6.55.15 mūtrāśaye †pāyuni muṣkayośca śopho rujo mūtravinigrahaśca/
śukrāśmarī tatsravaṇaṃ bhavedvā te te vikārā vihate tu śukre//
Su.6.55.16 tandrāṅgamardārucivibhramāḥ †syuḥ kṣudho+abhighātāt kṛśatā ca dṛṣṭeḥ/
Su.6.55.20 sāmānyataḥ pṛthaktvena kriyāṃ bhūyo nibodha me/
Su.6.55.21 purīṣaje tu kartavyo vidhirānāhiko bhavet/
Su.6.55.22 elāṃ vā+apyatha madyena kṣīraṃ vā+api pibennaraḥ/
māṃsopadaṃśaṃ madhu vā pibedvā sīdhu gauḍikam//
Su.6.55.24 bhadradāru ghanaṃ mūrvā haridrā madhukaṃ tathā/
Su.6.55.25 duḥsparśāsvarasaṃ vā+api kaṣāyaṃ kuṅkumasya ca/
Su.6.55.34 kṣudvighāte hitaṃ snigdhamuṣṇamalpaṃ ca bhojanam/
Su.6.55.35 bhojyo rasena viśrāntaḥ śramaśvāsāturo naraḥ/
Su.6.55.36 ādhmānādyeṣu rogeṣu yathāsvaṃ prayateta hi/
yacca yatra bhavetprāptaṃ tacca tasmin prayojayet//
bhojanaiḥ kupitaḥ sadya udāvartaṃ karoti hi//
Su.6.55.41 labhate ca bahūnanyān vikārān vātakopajān/
Su.6.55.43 athainaṃ bahuśaḥ svinnaṃ yuñjyāt snehavirecanaiḥ/
Su.6.55.47 ārevataphalaṃ cāpsu paktvā tena ghṛtaṃ pacet/
gavāṃ mūtreṇa tā vartīḥ kārayettu gudānugāḥ/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre udāvartapratiṣedho nāma (saptadaśo+ādhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) pañcapañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //55//

div.head: ṣaṭpañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.56.1 athāto visūcikāpratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.56.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.56.3 ajīrṇamāmaṃ viṣṭabdhaṃ vidagdhaṃ ca yadīritam/
Su.6.56.5 na tāṃ parimitāhārā labhante viditāgamāḥ/
Su.6.56.6 mūrcchātisārau vamathuḥ pipāsā śūlaṃ bhramodveṣṭanajṛmbhadāhāḥ/
vaivarṇyakampau hṛdaye rujaśca bhavanti tasyāṃ śirasaśca bhedaḥ//
Su.6.56.8 vātavarconirodhaśca kukṣau yasya bhṛśaṃ bhavet/
Su.6.56.9 duṣṭaṃ tu bhuktaṃ kaphamārutābhyāṃ pravartate nordhvamadhaśca yasya/
Su.6.56.10 yatrasthamāmaṃ virujettameva deśaṃ viśeṣeṇa vikārajātaiḥ/
Su.6.56.12 sādhyāsu pārṣṇyordahanaṃ praśastamagnipratāpo vamanaṃ ca tīkṣṇam/
pakve tato+anne tu vilaṅghanaṃ syāt saṃpācanaṃ cāpi virecanaṃ ca//
Su.6.56.13 viśuddhadehasya hi sadya eva mūrcchātisārādirupaiti śāntim/
āsthāpanaṃ cāpi vadanti pathyaṃ sarvāsu yogānaparānnibodha//
sukhāmbupītaṃ vinihantyajīrṇaṃ śūlaṃ visūcīmaruciṃ ca sadyaḥ//
Su.6.56.15 kṣārāgadaṃ vā lavaṇaṃ viṣaṃ vā guḍapragāḍhānatha sarṣapān vā/
amlena vā saindhavahiṅguyuktau sabījapūrṇau saghṛtau trivargau//
Su.6.56.16 kaṭutrikaṃ vā lavaṇairupetaṃ pibet snuhīkṣīravimiśritaṃ tu/
Su.6.56.17 kṛṣṇājamodakṣavakāṇi vā+api tulyau pibedvā magadhānikumbhau/
dantīyuta vā magadhodbhavānāṃ kalkaṃ pibet koṣavatīrasena//
vyoṣaṃ karañjasya phalaṃ haridre mūlaṃ samaṃ cāpyatha mātuluṅgyāḥ//
Su.6.56.19 chāyāviśuṣkā guṭikāḥ kṛtāstā hanyurvisūcīṃ nayanāñjanena/
suvāmitaṃ sādhuvirecitaṃ vā sulaṅghataṃ vā manujaṃ viditvā//
āmaṃ śakṛdvā nicitaṃ krameṇa bhūyo vibaddhaṃ viguṇānilena//
Su.6.56.22 āmāśaye śūlamatho gurutvaṃ hṛllāsa udgāravighātanaṃ ca/
Su.6.56.23 śvāsaśca pakvāśayaje bhavanti liṅgāni cātrālasakodbhavāni/
Su.6.56.24 athetaraṃ yo na śakṛdvamettamāmaṃ jayet svedanapācanaiśca/
Su.6.56.25 tānyeva vartīrviracedvicūrṇya mahiṣyajāvībhagavāṃ tu mūtraiḥ/
svinnasya pāyau viniveśya tāśca cūrṇāni caiṣāṃ pradhamettu nāḍyā//
Su.6.56.26 mūtreṣu saṃsādhya yathāvidhānaṃ dravyāṇi yānyūrdhvamadhaśca yānti/
eṣveva tailena ca sādhitena prāptaṃ yadi syādanuvāsayecca//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantre kāyacikitsātantre visūcikāpratiṣedho nāma (aṣṭādaśo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) ṣaṭpañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ //56//

div.head: saptapañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.57.1 athāto+arocakapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.57.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.57.3 doṣaiḥ pṛthak saha ca cittaviparyayācca bhaktāyaneṣu hṛdi cāvatate pragāḍham/
nānne rucirbhavati taṃ bhiṣajo vikāraṃ bhaktopaghātamiha pañcavidhaṃ vadanti///
Su.6.57.4 hṛcchūlapīḍanayutaṃ virasānanatvaṃ vātātmake bhavati liṅgamarocake tu/
hṛddāhacoṣabahutā mukhatiktatā ca mūrcchā satṛḍ bhavati pittakṛte tathaiva//
sarvātmake pavanapittakaphā bahūni rūpāṇyathāsya hṛdaye samudīrayanti//
vāte vacāmbuvamanaṃ kṛtavān pibecca snehaiḥ surābhirathavoṣṇajalena cūrṇam//
Su.6.57.8 nimbāmbuvāmitavataḥ kaphaje+anupānaṃ rājadrumāmbu madhunā tu sadīpyakaṃ syāt/
bījaiḥ karañjanṛpavṛkṣabhavaiśca piṣṭairlehaṃ pacet surabhimūtrayutaṃ yathāvat//
Su.6.57.10 mustāṃ vacāṃ trikaṭukaṃ rajanīdvayaṃ ca bhārgīṃ ca kuṣṭhamatha nirdahanīṃ ca piṣṭvā/
mūtre+avije dviradamūtrayute pacedvā pāṭhāṃ tugāmativiṣāṃ rajanīṃ ca mukhyām//
Su.6.57.11 maṇḍūkimarkamamṛtāṃ ca salāṅgalākhyāṃ mūtre pacettu mahiṣasya vidhānavidvā/
etānna santi caturo lihatastu lehān gulmāruciśvasanakaṇṭhahṛdāmayāśca//
Su.6.57.12 sātmyān †svadeśaracitān vividhāṃśca bhakṣyān pānāni mūlaphalaṣāḍavarāgayogān/
adyādrasāṃśca vividhān vividhaiḥ prakārairbhuñjīta cāpi laghurūkṣamanaḥsukhāni//
Su.6.57.13 āsthāpanaṃ vidhivadatra virecanaṃ ca kuryānmṛdūni śirasaśca virecanāni/
Su.6.57.14 kṣaudrāyutāni vitarenmukhabodhanārthamanyāni† tiktakaṭukāni ca bheṣajāni/
Su.6.57.15 mūtrāsavairguḍakṛtaiśca tathā tvariṣṭaiḥ kṣārāsavaiśca madhumādhavatulyagandhaiḥ/
syādeṣa eva kaphavātahate vidhiśca śāntiṃ gate hutabhuji praśamāya tasya//
Su.6.57.16 icchābhighātabhayaśokahate+antaragnau bhāvān bhavāya vitaret khalu śakyarūpān/
Su.6.57.17 dainyaṃ gate manasi bodhanamatra śastaṃ yadyat priyaṃ tadupasevyamarocake tu//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantrāntargate kāyacikitsātantre+arocakapratiṣedho nāma (ekonaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) saptapañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ//57//

div.head: aṣṭāpañcāśattamo+adhyāyaḥ/

lg.l: mūtraukasādau dvau cāpi rogā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ//
vātakuṇḍalikāṃ taṃ tu vyādhiṃ vidyāt sudāruṇam//
vedanā ca parā bastau vātāṣṭhīleti tāṃ viduḥ//
Su.6.58.11 vegaṃ sandhārya mūtrasya yo bhūyaḥ sraṣṭumicchati/
Su.6.58.15 bastau vā+apyathavā nāle maṇau vā yasya dehinaḥ/
Su.6.58.18 abhyantare bastimukhe vṛtto+alpaḥ sthira eva ca/
bastiṃ meḍhraṃ gudaṃ caiva pradahan srāvayedadhaḥ//
Su.6.58.23 mūtraṃ hāridramathavā saraktaṃ raktameva vā/
Su.6.58.24 viśadaṃ pītakaṃ mūtraṃ sadāhaṃ bahalaṃ tathā/
Su.6.58.25 mūtraukasādaṃ taṃ vidyādrogaṃ pittakṛtaṃ budhaḥ/
Su.6.58.27 kaṣāyakalkasarpiṃṣi bhakṣyān lehān payāṃsi ca/
Su.6.58.42 tālasya taruṇaṃ mūlaṃ trapusasya rasaṃ tathā/
śvetaṃ karkaṭakaṃ caiva prātastu payasā pibet//
Su.6.58.43 śṛtaṃ vā madhuraiḥ kṣīraṃ sarpirmiśraṃ pibennaraḥ/
Su.6.58.45 akṣabījaṃ ca surayā kalkīkṛtya pibennaraḥ/
kṣīre pariśṛtān tatra pibet sarpiḥ samāyutān//
Su.6.58.49 pibedguḍena miśraṃ vā lihyāllehān pṛthak pṛthak/
ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi mūtradoṣe kramaṃ hitam//
vidhānaṃ tasya pūrvaṃ hi vyāsataḥ parikīrtitam//
Su.6.58.53 kṣaudrārdhapātraṃ dattvā ca pātraṃ tu kṣīrasarpiṣaḥ/
śarkarāyāśca cūrṇaṃ ca drākṣācūrṇaṃ ca tatsamam//
tataḥ pāṇitalaṃ cūrṇaṃ līḍhvā kṣīraṃ tataḥ pibet//
Su.6.58.56 etat sarpiḥ prayuñjānaḥ śuddhadeho naraḥ sadā/
Su.6.58.57 jayecchoṇitadoṣāṃśca vandhyā garbhaṃ labheta ca/
Su.6.58.58 balā kolāsthi madhukaṃ śvadaṃṣṭrā+atha śatāvarī/
Su.6.58.60 etāni samabhāgāni matimān saha sādhayet/
Su.6.58.61 droṇāvaśiṣṭaṃ tat pūtaṃ pacettena ghṛtāḍhakam/
tat siddhaṃ kalaśe sthāpyaṃ kṣaudraprasthena saṃyutam//
tasya khādedyathāśakti mātrāṃ kṣīraṃ tataḥ pibet//
Su.6.58.65 ojasvī balavānmartyaḥ pibenneva ca hṛṣyati/
Su.6.58.66 drākṣā viśālā pippalyastathā citraphalā bhevet/
Su.6.58.69 tato mitaṃ pibetkāle yathādoṣaṃ yathābalam/
Su.6.58.71 †prakṣāhitaṃ ca dhanyaṃ ca sarvarogāpahaṃ śivam/

div.head: ūnaṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.59.1 athāto mūtrakṛcchrapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.59.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.59.3 vātena pittena kaphena sarvaistathā+ābhighātaiḥ śakṛdaśmarībhyām/
Su.6.59.9 vātabastestu tulyāni tasya liṅgāni lakṣayet/
Su.6.59.10 ādhmānaṃ ca saśūlaṃ ca mūtrasaṅgaṃ karoti hi/
śarkarāyā viśeṣaṃ tu śṛṇu kīrtayato mama//
Su.6.59.13 hṛtpīḍā vepathuḥ śūlaṃ kukṣau† vahniḥ sudurbalaḥ/
Su.6.59.16 aśmarīṃ ca samāśritya yaduktaṃ prasamīkṣya tat/

div.head: ṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.60.1 athāto+amānuṣopasargapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.60.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.60.5 aśuciṃ bhinnamaryādaṃ kṣataṃ vā yadi vā+akṣatam/
Su.6.60.7 devāstathā śatrugaṇāśca teṣāṃ gandharvayakṣāḥ pitaro bhujaṅgāḥ/
rakṣāṃsi yā cāpi piśācajātireṣo+aṣṭako devagaṇo grahākhyaḥ//
Su.6.60.8 saṃtuṣṭaḥ śucirapi ceṣṭagandhamālyo nistandrī hyavitathasaṃskṛtaprabhāṣī/
tejasvī sthiranayano varapradātā brahmaṇyo bhavati naraḥ sa devajuṣṭaḥ//
Su.6.60.9 saṃsvedī dvijagurudevadoṣavaktā jihmākṣo vigatabhayo vimārgadṛṣṭiḥ/
santuṣṭo bhavati na cānnapānajātairduṣṭātmā bhavati ca devaśatrujuṣṭaḥ//
nṛtyan vai prahasati cāru cālpaśabdaṃ gandharvagrahaparipīḍito manuṣyaḥ//
tejasvī vadati ca kiṃ dadāmi kasmai yo yakṣagrahaparipīḍito manuṣyaḥ//
Su.6.60.12 pretebhyo visṛjati saṃstareṣu piṇḍān śāntātmā jalamapi cāpasavyavastraḥ/
Su.6.60.13 bhūmau yaḥ prasarati sarpavat kadācit sṛkkiṇyau vilikhati† jihvayā tathaiva/
krodhālurvipulabalo niśāvihārī śaucadviḍ bhavati ca rakṣasā gṛhītaḥ//
Su.6.60.16 sthūlākṣastvaritagatiḥ svaphenalehī nidrāluḥ patati ca kampate ca yo+ati/
yaścādridviradanagādivicyutaḥ san saṃsṛṣṭo na bhavati vārdhakena juṣṭaḥ//
Su.6.60.18 kṛṣṇakṣaye ca pitaraḥ paścamyāmapi coragāḥ/
Su.6.60.19 darpaṇādīn yathā chāyā śītoṣṇaṃ prāṇino yathā/
svamaṇiṃ bhāskarasyosrā yathā dehaṃ ca dehadhṛk/
Su.6.60.20 tapāṃsi tīvrāṇi tathaiva dānaṃ vratāni dharmo niyamāśca satyam/
guṇāstathā+aṣṭāvapi teṣu nityā vyastāḥ samastāśca yathāprabhāvam//
Su.6.60.21 na te manuṣyaiḥ saha saṃviśanti na vā manuṣyān kvacidāviśanti/
Su.6.60.22 teṣāṃ grahāṇāṃ paricārakā ye koṭīsahasrāyutapadmasaṃkhyāḥ/
Su.6.60.23 niśācarāṇāṃ teṣāṃ hi ye devagaṇamāśritāḥ/
Su.6.60.24 devagrahā iti punaḥ procyante+aśucayaśca† ye/
Su.6.60.27 bhūtānīti kṛtā saṃjñā teṣāṃ saṃjñāpravaktṛbhiḥ/
Su.6.60.30 bhakṣyāśca sarve sarveṣāṃ sāmānyo vidhirucyate/
Su.6.60.31 yāni yeṣāṃ yatheṣṭāni tāni tebhyaḥ pradāpayet/
hiṃsanti manujān yeṣu prāyaśo divaseṣu tu//
Su.6.60.38 na śakyā balibhirjetuṃ yogaistān samupācaret/
Su.6.60.39 hiṅguṃ mūtraṃ ca bastasya dhūmamasya prayojayet/
etena śāmyati kṣipraṃ balavānapi yo grahaḥ//
Su.6.60.43 śirīṣabījaṃ laśunaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ siddhārthakaṃ vacām/
Su.6.60.45 haridre ca kṛtā vartyaḥ pūrvavannayanāñjanam/
saindhavaṃ kaṭukāṃ hiṅguṃ vayaḥsthāṃ ca vacāmapi/
Su.6.60.46 ye ye grahā na sidhyanti sarveṣāṃ nayanāñjanam/
Su.6.60.47 golomī cājalomī ca bhūtakeśī jaṭā tathā/
Su.6.60.48 vajraproktā† vayaḥsthā ca śṛṅgī mohanavallikā/
Su.6.60.49 naipālī haritālaṃ ca rakṣoghnā ye ca kīrtitāḥ/
Su.6.60.51 asmin varge bhiṣak kuryāttailāni ca ghṛtāni ca/
Su.6.60.55 ṛte piśācādanyatra pratikūlaṃ na cācaret/
tataḥ prāpsyati siddhiṃ ca yaśaśca vipulaṃ bhiṣak//

div.head: ekaṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.61.1 athāto+apasmārapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.61.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.61.7 hṛtkampaḥ śūnyatā svedo dhyānaṃ mūrcchā pramūḍhatā/
dantān khādan vaman phenaṃ vivṛtākṣaḥ patet kṣitau//
Su.6.61.10 alpakālānataraṃ cāpi punaḥ saṃjñāṃ labheta saḥ/
so+apasmāra iti proktaḥ sa ca dṛṣṭaścaturvidhaḥ//
vepamāno daśan dantān śvasan phenaṃ vamannapi//
Su.6.61.12 yo brūyādvikṛtaṃ sattvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ māmanudhāvati/
Su.6.61.14 tato me cittanāśaḥ syāt sa pittabhava ucyate/
Su.6.61.15 yo brūyādvikṛtaṃ sattvaṃ śuklaṃ māmanudhāvati/
tato me cittanāśaḥ syāt so+apasmāraḥ kaphātmakaḥ//
pralāpaḥ kūjanaṃ kleśaḥ pratyekaṃ tu bhavediha//
Su.6.61.19 āgamādvaiśvarūpyācca sa tu nirvarṇyate budhaiḥ/
deve varṣatyapi yathā bhūmau bījāni kānicit//
Su.6.61.22 tasya kāryo vidhiḥ sarvo ya unmādeṣu vakṣyate/
Su.6.61.23 upayogo grahoktānāṃ yogānāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ/
tataḥ sidhyanti te sarve yogairanyaiśca sādhayet/
Su.6.61.24 caturguṇe gavāṃ mūtre tailābhyañjane hitam/
Su.6.61.25 pitteṣu siddhaṃ tailaṃ ca pānābhyaṅgeṣu pūjitam/
Su.6.61.26 pūjāṃ rudrasya kurvīta tadgaṇānāṃ ca nityaśaḥ/
Su.6.61.28 jaṭilāṃ pañcamūlyau dve pathyāṃ cotkvāthya yatnataḥ/
Su.6.61.29 kākolyādipratīvāpaṃ siddhaṃ ca prathame gaṇe/
Su.6.61.30 kākolyādipratīvāpaṃ siddhaṃ ca prathame gaṇe/
Su.6.61.39 jñātvā ca madhurībhūtaṃ taṃ viśasyānnamuddharet/
śuddhe kumbhe nidadhyācca saṃbhāraṃ taṃ surāṃ tataḥ//
sirāṃ vidhyedatha prāptāṃ maṅgalyāni ca dhārayet//

div.head: dviṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.62.1 athāta unmādapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.62.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: mānasena ca duḥkhena sa pañcavidha ucyate//
Su.6.62.5 viṣādbhavati ṣaṣṭhaśca yathāsvaṃ tatra bheṣajam/
Su.6.62.8 rūkṣacchaviḥ paruṣavāgdhamanītato vā †śītāturaḥ kṛśatanuḥ sphuritāṅgasandhiḥ/
āsphoṭayasyaṭati gāyati nṛtyaśīlo vikrośati bhramati cāpyanilaprakopāt//
tīkṣṇo himāmbuni caye+api sa vahniśaṅkī pittāddivā nabhasi paśyati tārakāśca//
nidrāparo+alpakathano+alpabhuguṣṇasevī rātrau bhṛśaṃ bhavati cāpi kaphaprakopāt//
Su.6.62.11 sarvātmake pavanapittakaphā yathāsvaṃ saṃharṣitā iva ca liṅgamudīrayanti//
gāḍhaṃ kṣate manasi ca priyayā riraṃsorjāyeta cotkaṭataro manaso vikāraḥ//
Su.6.62.13 citraṃ sa jalpati manonugataṃ visaṃjño gāyatyatho hasati roditi †mūḍhasaṃjñaḥ/
raktekṣaṇo hatabalendriyabhāḥ sudīnaḥ śyāvānano viṣakṛto†+atha bhavet parāsuḥ//
Su.6.62.14 snigdhaṃ svinnaṃ tu manujamunmādārtaṃ viśodhayet/
sarṣapānāṃ ca tailena nasyābhyaṅgau hitau sadā//
Su.6.62.18 bhīṣayet saṃyataṃ pāśaiḥ kaśābhirvā+atha tāḍayet/
Su.6.62.21 kevalānambuyuktān vā kulmāṣān vā bahuśrutaḥ/
hṛdyaṃ yaddīpanīyaṃ ca tatpathyaṃ tasya bhojayet(yojayet)//
Su.6.62.26 apasmāraṃ grahaṃ śoṣaṃ klaibyaṃ kārśyamabījatām/
khyātaṃ phalaghṛtaṃ strīṇāṃ vandhyānāṃ cāśu garbhadam//)
Su.6.62.30 brahmīmaindrīṃ viḍaṅgāni vyoṣaṃ hiṅgu surāṃ jaṭhām/
viṣaghnīṃ laśunaṃ rāsnāṃ viśalyāṃ surasāṃ vacām//
viṣaje mṛdupūrvāṃ ca viṣaghnīṃ kārayet kriyām//

div.head: triṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.63.1 athāto rasabhedavikalpamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.63.4 avidagdhā vidagdhāśca bhidyante te triṣaṣṭidhā/
Su.6.63.7 trīṃścānugacchati raso lavaṇaḥ kaṭuko dvayam/
tiktaḥ kaṣāyamanveti te dvikā daśa pañca ca//

Su.6.63.8 tadyathā madhurāmlaḥ, madhuralavaṇaḥ, madhurakaṭukaḥ, madhuratiktaḥ, madhurakaṣāyaḥ, ete pañcānukrāntā madhureṇa; amlalavaṇaḥ, amlakaṭukaḥ, amlatiktaḥ, amlakaṣāyaḥ, ete catvāro+anukrāntā amlena; lavaṇakaṭukaḥ, lavaṇatiktaḥ, lavaṇakaṣāyaḥ, ete trayo+anukāntā lavaṇena; kaṭutiktaḥ, kaṭukaṣāyaḥ, dvāvetāvanukrāntau kaṭukena; tiktakaṣāyaḥ eka evānukrāntastiktena; †evamete pañcadaśa dvikasaṃyogā vyākhyātāḥ//

Su.6.63.10 tadyathā madhurāmlalavaṇaḥ, madhurāmlakaṭukaḥ, madhurāmlatiktaḥ, madhurāmalakaṣāyaḥ, madhuralavaṇakaṭukaḥ, madhuralavaṇātiktaḥ, madhuralavaṇakaṣāyaḥ, madhurakaṭukatiktaḥ, madhurakaṭukaṣāyaḥ, madhuratiktakaṣāyaḥ, evameṣāṃ daśānāṃ trikasaṃyogānāmādau madhuraḥ prayujyate; amlalavaṇakaṭukaḥ, amlalavaṇatiktaḥ, amlalavaṇakaṣāyaḥ, amlakaṭutiktaḥ, amlakaṭukaṣāyaḥ, amlatiktakaṣāyaḥ, evameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāmādāvamlaḥ prayujyate; lavaṇakaṭutiktaḥ, lavaṇakaṭukaṣāyaḥ, lavaṇatiktakaṣāyaḥ, evameṣāṃ trayāṇāmādau lavaṇaḥ prayujyate; kaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ, evamekasyādau kaṭukaḥ prayujyate; evamete trikasaṃyogā viṃśatirvyākhyātāḥ//

Su.6.63.12 madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭukaḥ, madhurāmlalavaṇatiktaḥ, madhurāmlalavaṇakaṣāyaḥ, madhurāmlakaṭukatiktaḥ, madhurāmlakaṭukaṣāyaḥ, madhurāmlatiktakaṣāyaḥ, madhuralavaṇakaṭukatiktaḥ, madhuralavaṇakaṭukaṣāyaḥ, madhuralavaṇatiktakaṣāyaḥ, madhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ, evameṣāṃ daśānāmādau madhuraḥ prayujyate; amlalavaṇakaṭutiktaḥ, amlalavaṇakaṭukaṣāyaḥ, amlalavaṇatiktakaṣāyaḥ, amlakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ, evameṣāṃ caturṇāmādāvamlaḥ; lavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ, evamekasyādau lavaṇaḥ; evamete catuṣkarasasaṃyogāḥ pañcadaśa kīrtitāḥ//

Su.6.63.14 madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktaḥ, madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭukaṣāyaḥ, madhurāmlalavaṇatiktakaṣāyaḥ, madhurāmlakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ, madhuralavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ, evameṣāṃ pañcānāmādau madhuraḥ prayujyate; amlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ, evamekasyādāvamlaḥ; evamete ṣaṭ pañcakasaṃyogā vyākhyātāḥ//
Su.6.63.15 ṣaṭkamekaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ; ekastu ṣaṭkasaṃyogaḥ madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ; eṣa eka eva ṣaṭsaṃyogaḥ//
Su.6.63.16 ekaikaśca ṣaṭsā bhavanti madhuraḥ, amlaḥ, lavaṇaḥ, kaṭukaḥ, tiktaḥ, kaṣāyaḥ, iti//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantre tantrabhūṣaṇādhyāyeṣu rasabhedavikalpādhyāyo nāma (prathamaḥ, āditaḥ) triṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ //63//

div.head: catuḥṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.64.1 athātaḥ svasthavṛttamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.64.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.64.3 sūtrasthāne samuddiṣṭaḥ svastho bhavati yādṛśaḥ/
Su.6.64.4 tasya yadvṛttamuktaṃ hi rakṣaṇaṃ ca mayā++āditaḥ/
Su.6.64.5 yasmin yasminnṛtau ye ye doṣāḥ kupyanti dehinām/
teṣu teṣu pradātavyāḥ rasāste te vijānatā//
Su.6.64.12 śīte sāgnau nivāte ca guruprāvaraṇe gṛhe/
Su.6.64.15 salilaṃ ca prasannatvāt sarvameva tadā hitam/
Su.6.64.18 rātrau jāgagṇaṃ caiva maithunaṃ cāpi varjayet/
bhajecca śāradaṃ mālyaṃ sīdhoḥ pānaṃ ca yuktitaḥ//
Su.6.64.21 pittapraśamanaṃ yacca tacca sarvaṃ samācaret/
Su.6.64.23 rasamucchoṣayatyāśu tasmāt snigdhaṃ tadā hitam/
Su.6.64.27 prakāmaṃ ca niṣeveta maithunaṃ tarpito nṛpaḥ/
Su.6.64.28 annapānaṃ tilān māṣāñchākāni ca dadhīni ca/
Su.6.64.30 madyāni ca prasannāni yacca kiñcit balapradam/
) eṣa eva vidhiḥ kāryaḥ śiśire samudāhṛtaḥ//
auṣṇyādvasante kupitaḥ kurute ca gadān bahūn//
Su.6.64.36 vyāyāmamañjanaṃ dhūmaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca kavalagraham/
utsādanaṃ tathā snānaṃ vanitāḥ kānanāni ca//
Su.6.64.43 gharmakāle niṣeveta vāsāṃsi sulaghūni ca/
Su.6.64.44 pānakāni ca seveta manthāṃścāpi saśarkarān/
bhojanaṃ ca hitaṃ śītaṃ saghṛtaṃ madhuradravam//
Su.6.64.45 śṛtena payasā rātrau śarkarāmadhureṇa ca/
tāpātyaye hitā nityaṃ rasā ye guravastrayaḥ//
Su.6.64.47 payo māṃsarasāḥ koṣṇāstailāni ca ghṛtāni ca/
vyāyāmaṃ ca divāsvapnaṃ vyavāyaṃ cātra varjayet//
Su.6.64.51 harmyamadhye nivāte ca bhajecchayyāṃ mṛdūttarām/
Su.6.64.53 taddhi srvopayogeṣu tasmin kāle vivarjayet/
Su.6.64.54 pibet prāvṛṣi jīrṇāṃstu rātrau tānapi varjayet/
ṛtāvṛtau ya etena vidhinā vartate naraḥ//
Su.6.64.61 śuṣkadehān pipāsārtān durbalānapi ca dravaiḥ/
ataḥ paraṃ tu svasthānāṃ vṛttyarthaṃ sarva eva ca/
†tatrābhaktaṃ prāgbhaktamadhobhaktaṃ madhyebhaktamantarābhaktaṃ sabhaktaṃ sāmudgaṃ muhurmuhurgrāsaṃ grāsāntaraṃ ceti daśauṣadhakālāḥ//
Su.6.64.67 vīryādhikaṃ bhavati bheṣajamannahīnaṃ hanyāttathā†++āmayamasaṃśayamāśu caiva/
†tadbālavṛddhavanitāmṛdavastu pītvā glāniṃ parāṃ samupayānti balakṣayaṃ ca//
Su.6.64.69 śīghraṃ vipākamupayāti balaṃ na hiṃsyādannāvṛtaṃ na ca muhurvardanānnireti/
Su.6.64.71 madhyebhaktaṃ nāma yanmadhye bhaktasya pīyate//
Su.6.64.72 pītaṃ yadannamupayujya tadūrdhvakāye hanyādgadān bahuvidhāṃśca balaṃ dadāti/
madhye tu pītamapahantyavisāribhāvādye madhyadehamabhibhūya bhavanti rogāḥ//
Su.6.64.75 pathyaṃ sabhaktamabalābalayorhi nityaṃ taddveṣiṇāmapi tathā śiśuvṛddhayośca/
hṛdyaṃ manobalakaraṃ tvatha dīpanaṃ ca pathyaṃ sadā bhavati cāntarabhaktakaṃ yat//
Su.6.64.77 doṣe dvidhā pravisṛte tu samudgasaṃjñamādyantayoryadaśanasya niṣevyate tu//
Su.6.64.79 śvāse muhurmuhuratiprasṛte ca kāse hikkāvamīṣu sa vadantyupayojyametat//
Su.6.64.82 grāseṣu† cūrṇamabalāgniṣu dīpanīyaṃ vājīkarāṇyapi tu yojayituṃ yateta/
Su.6.64.84 visṛṣṭe viṇmūtre viśadakaraṇe dehe ca sulaghau/
viśuddhe codgāre hṛdi suvimale vāte ca sarati/
pradeyastvāhāro bhavati bhiṣajāṃ kālaḥ sa tu mataḥ//

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantre tantrabhūṣaṇādhyāyeṣu svasvavṛttādhyāyo nāma (dvitīyo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) catuḥṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ //64//

div.head: pañcaṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.65.1 athātastantrayuktimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.65.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: tadyathā adhikaraṇaṃ, yogaḥ, padārthaḥ, hetvarthaḥ, uddeśaḥ, nirdeśaḥ, upadeśaḥ, apadeśaḥ, pradeśaḥ, atideśaḥ, apavarjaḥ, vākyaśeṣaḥ, arthāpattiḥ, viparyayaḥ, prasaṅgaḥ, ekāntaḥ, anekāntaḥ, pūrvapakṣaḥ, nirṇayaḥ, anumataṃ, vidhānam, anāgatāvekṣaṇam, atikrāntāvekṣaṇaṃ, saṃśayaḥ, vyākhyānaṃ, svasaṃjñā, nirvacanaṃ, nidarśanaṃ, niyogaḥ, vikalpaḥ, samuccayaḥ, ūhyam, iti//
Su.6.65.4 atrāsāṃ tantrayuktīnāṃ kiṃ prayojanam ucyate vākyayojanamarthayojanaṃ ca//
Su.6.65.5 bhavanti cātra ślokāḥ asadvādiprayuktānāṃ vākyānāṃ pratiṣedhanam/
Su.6.65.6 †vyāktā noktāstu ye hyarthā līnā ye cāpyanirmalāḥ/
leśoktā ye ca† kecitsyusteṣāṃ cāpi prasādhanam//
Su.6.65.8 tatra yamarthamadhikṛtyocyate tadadhikaraṇaṃ; yathā rasaṃ doṣaṃ vā//
Su.6.65.9 yena vākyaṃ yujyate sa yogaḥ/
siddhaṃ balābhyāṃ ca sadevadāru hitāya nityaṃ galagaṇḍaroge/
ityatra tailaṃ siddhaṃ pibediti prathamaṃ vaktavye tṛtīyapāde siddhamiti prayuktaṃ, evaṃ dūrasthānāmapi padānāmekīkaraṇaṃ yogaḥ//
Su.6.65.10 yo+artho+abhihitaḥ sūtre pade †vā sa padārthaḥ; padasya padayoḥ padānāṃ vā+arthaḥ padārthaḥ; aparimitāśca padārthāḥ/

yathā snehasvedāñjaneṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu dvayostrayāṇāṃ vā+arthānāmupapattirdṛśyate, tatra yo+arthaḥ pūrvāparayogasiddho bhavati sa grahītavyaḥ; yathā devotpattimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma ityukte sandihyate buddhiḥ katamasya †vedasyotpattiṃ vakṣyatīti, yataḥ ṛgvedādayastu vedāḥ; vida vicāraṇe, vidḷ lābhe, ityetayośca dhātvoranekārthayoḥ prayogāt,tatra pūrvāparayogamupalabhya pratipattirbhavati āyurvedotpattimayaṃ vivakṣuriti; eṣa padārthaḥ//
yathā mṛtpiṇḍo+adbhiḥ praklidyate tathā māṣadugdhaprabhṛtibhirvraṇaḥ praklidyata iti//
yathā tathā na jāgṛyādrātrau divāsvapnaṃ ca varjayet iti//
Su.6.65.15 anena kāraṇenetyapadeśaḥ, yathā+apadiśyate madhuraḥ śleṣmāṇamabhivardhayatīti//
Su.6.65.19 yena padenānuktena vākyaṃ samāpyeta sa vākyaśeṣaḥ/
yathā śiraḥpāṇipādapārśvapṛṣṭhodarorasāmityukte puruṣagrahaṇaṃ vinā+api gamyate puruṣasyeti//
yathā odanaṃ bhokṣye ityukte+arthādāpannaṃ bhavati nāyaṃ pipāsuryavāgūmiti//
yathā kṛśālpaprāṇabhīravo duścikitsyā ityukte viparītaṃ gṛhyate dṛḍhādayaḥ sucikitsyā iti//
Su.6.65.22 prakaraṇāntareṇa †samāpanaṃ prasaṅgaḥ, yadvā prakaraṇāntarito yo+artho+†asakṛduktaḥ samāpyate sa prasaṅgaḥ/

yathā pañcamahābhūtaśarīrisamavāyaḥ puruṣastasmin kriyā so+adhiṣṭhānamiti vedotpattāvabhidhāya, bhūtacintāyāṃ punaruktaṃ yato+abhihitaṃ pañcamahābhūtaśarīrisamavāyaḥ puruṣa iti, sa khalveṣa karmapuruṣaścikitsādhikṛta iti//
yathā kecidācāryā bruvate dravyaṃ pradhānaṃ, kecidrasaṃ, kecidvīryaṃ kecidvipākamiti//
yathā kathaṃ vātanimittāścatvāraḥ pramehā asādhyā bhavantīti//
yathā śarīraṃ prapīḍya paścādadho gatvā vasāmedomajjānuviddhaṃ mūtraṃ visṛjati vātaḥ, evamasādhyā vātajā iti//
Su.6.65.27 tathā coktam kṛtsnaṃ śarīraṃ niṣpīḍya medomajjāvasāyutaḥ/
yathā anyo brūyāt sapta rasā iti, taccāpratiṣedhādanumanyate kathaṃciditi//
yathā iha pañcaviṃśatikaḥ puruṣo vyākhyāyate, anyeṣvāyurvedatantreṣu bhūtādiprabhṛtyārabhya †cintā//
yathā agnirvāyunā sahitaḥ †kakṣe vṛddhiṃ gacchati tathā vātapittakaphaduṣṭo vraṇa iti//

yathā abhihitamannapānavidhau caturvidhaṃ cānnamupadiśyate bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ peyamiti, evaṃ caturvidhe vaktavye dvividhamabhihitam; idamatrohyam annapāne viśiṣṭayordvayorgrahaṇe kṛte caturṇāmapi grahaṇaṃ bhavatīti; †caturvidhaścāhāraḥ praviralaḥ, prāyeṇa dvividha eva; ato dvitvaṃ prasiddhamiti/
kiñcānyat annena bhakṣyamavaruddhaṃ, ghanasādharmyāt; peyena lehyaṃ, dravasādhamyāt†//
Su.6.65.43 yo hyetā vidhivadvetti dīpībhūtāstu buddhimān/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantre tantrabhūṣaṇādhyāyeṣu tantrayuktirnāma (tṛtīyo+adhyāyaḥ, āditaḥ) pañcaṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ //65//

div.head: ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.ab: Su.6.66.1 athāto doṣabhedavikalpamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Su.6.66.2 yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ//

lg.l: Su.6.66.5 kati tatraikaśo jñeyā dviśo vā+apyathavā triśaḥ/
trayo doṣā dhātavaśca purīṣaṃ mūtrameva ca//
Su.6.66.8 rogāṇāṃ tu sahasraṃ yacchataṃ viṃśatireva ca/
Su.6.66.9 vyāsataḥ kīrtitaṃ taddhi bhinnā doṣāstrayo guṇāḥ/
Su.6.66.10 traya eva pṛthak doṣā dviśo nava samādhikaiḥ/
Su.6.66.11 pañcāśadevaṃ tu saha bhavanti kṣayamāgataiḥ/
Su.6.66.14 bhiṣak kartā+atha karaṇaṃ rasā doṣāstu kāraṇam/
Su.6.66.17 sahottaraṃ tvetadadhītya sarvaṃ brāhmaṃ vidhānena yathoditena/

div.trailer: iti suśrutasaṃhitāyāmuttaratantre doṣabhedavikalpo nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo+adhyāyaḥ//66//
iti sauśrute āyurvedaśāstre uttarasthānaṃ samāptam//
